channel.title: Gyeonggi-do on Every Corner of Korea

item.title: Along the frozen stream, 'warm exhibition' Gwangju Gyeongancheon, Bunwon-ri - Gwangju, Gyeonggi-do, Korea
item.description:
Gyeongancheon to join Paldang Lake
Scenery of the face museum
Gyeongancheon Wetland Ecological Park

Along the frozen stream, 'warm exhibition' Gwangju Gyeongancheon, Bunwon-ri

Gwangju, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

Even if the water path is tightly frozen, the warmth of calm emotion is transmitted. Road 337, which runs along Bunwon-ri and Gyeongancheon, is a path that blends history, exhibitions, and walking spaces in history. Namhan River, Paldang Lake and the clean path leading to the exhibition halls, old kilns and ecological parks await.

Marsh Ecological Park and the last kiln of the royal family
The corner towns where Gyeongancheon and Namhan River meet are separated from the world for a moment. There are no boats and people on the water that has become a water resource protection area, and the local road No. 337 that bypasses to Yangpyeong is even the best.
When you pass the Toechon Intersection along the path that crosses the Gyeongancheon River, the Gyeongancheon Wetland Ecological Park reveals a calm look. The wetland ecological park, belonging to the eight views of Gwangju, has a different winter walk. The white trail connecting the riverside and the wetland extends for about 2km. There are friendly guides to the flora and fauna inhabiting the ecological park. Gyeongancheon River, where you can meet elk and migratory birds, is also the wintering place of Koni. The riverside leading to the bird's eye view is also popular for family walks and dating dates for lovers. There are shelter everywhere, helping to remember the winter.
The way to the White House
As you enter Namwon-myeon Bundwon-ri, downstream of Gyeongancheon, time flows slowly. Although the surrounding villages are quiet, the spirits contained in them are high-class. Bunwon-ri is where the last kiln of the Joseon Dynasty was located. The village name 'Bunwon-ri' is also named after the white porcelain branch of Saongwon, which was responsible for the food of the court. Good clay and firewood were needed to bake a bowl used in the palace, and an old kiln was created where the river stem meets the Han River.
Wooden deck walkway at Gyeongancheon Wetland Ecological Park
Branch of the White Porcelain Museum (031-766-8465, www.bunwon.or.kr In terms of scale, even if it lags behind Gwangju Ceramic Museum in Gwangju, it is still different from the story. Located on a hill behind a secluded village, the museum remodeled the school and raised the building. It is a warm consideration not to damage the white porcelain that was buried in the elementary school site. The Japanese Imperial High School was established at the place where the royal bowl was to be cooked, and the site was revealed through excavation work in the early 2000s. The refurbished museum is strongly surrounded by iron plates.
Pieces of white porcelain found in Bunwon-ri
On the way to the museum, the names of the discovered whites are engraved, and the selection fees of Saongwon are lined up side by side. Inside the museum, white porcelain from the time of excavation is displayed. In the museum, you can decorate a postcard by stamping it, and if you make a reservation in advance, you can experience making a bowl yourself. It is a small space, but the friendly atmosphere with commentary is also friendly.
The winter scenery overlooking the front of the museum is as elegant as white porcelain. Gyeongancheon and Paldang Lake blend smoothly over a large tree. The Bunwon White porcelain museum is free of charge, all year round.
Bunwon white porcelain museum
Bizarre and historical museum full of stories

In Bunwon-ri, a unique museum attracts attention. The face museum behind Namjongmyeon Office (031-765-3522, www.visagej.org ) Is a space where dolls, masks, etc. from around the world are exhibited using faces. Founded by a theater director, this museum decorates the courtyard with hanok and stone statues in Namdo, and has a shelter for a cup of tea. The Face Museum will be closed until February 12th to replace the exhibits and will be reopened from the 13th. Mondays and Tuesdays are closed, and Wednesdays and Thursdays must be reserved in advance to enter. It is always open from Friday to Sunday.

Face-themed face museum
The quiet exhibition halls continue along the waterways. To get a good view of Paldang Lake, which is in contact with Gyeongancheon, we will go to the Water Environment Exhibition Hall (031-8008-6937). On the 9th floor of the renovated building, there is an exhibition hall overlooking the Paldang Lake. On the other hand, when you look at the observation deck on the other hand, you can see the beautiful views of Paldang from Sonae Island, Yogja Island, and Yebongsan Mountain without interruption. A telescope is also provided so you can closely observe traces on the river that are easy to miss on the ground. From the past of Paldang Lake, it has been decorated as a scientific experience space where you can feel the preciousness of plants and animals and water.
Water Environment Exhibition Hall
In the vicinity of Gyeongancheon, there is also a meaningful space where you can calmly organize your excursion. This is the nest and history of Japanese women's comfort women who entered Wondang-ri. Here, the comfort women's grandmothers lived in a community, and the Human Rights Museum with the theme of comfort women also opened. Just looking at the pictures and statues of the grandmothers who filled the walls, it makes me heartbroken. Every spring, a memorial service is held at the History Museum.
Filling the quiet Gyeongancheon and Bunwon-ri with a solid sense of fullness is the local specialty of steamed carp. Downstream of Gyeongancheon has been famous for true fish. There are over 20 restaurants specializing in steamed carp in Bunwon-ri, and some restaurants boast a tradition of over 20 years. Fishing for crucian carp was banned to protect water resources, but the legend of crucian simmered with various secrets such as rugs continues to this day.
Statue of the comfort woman
Travel information

1.Access

* Self-driving

Jungbu Expressway Gwangju IC → Doma Samgeori → Turn left at Toechon Intersection, turn to Bunwon-ri, and turn right to Gyeongancheon Wetland Ecological Park

* public transport

Take bus No. 13-2 to Toechon from East Seoul Terminal. From Toechon-myeon to Bunwon-ri, use an autonomous circulation bus

2. Delicious

Hometown Maeuntang: Namjong-myeon Bunwon-ri / Steamed fish / 031-767-9693
Toechon Mill Noodle House: Toechon-myeon Dosu-ri / Milmyeon / 031-767-9280
Chestnut House: Jungsan-myeon Sanseong-ri / Tofu Octopus Hotpot / 031-746-9643
Dongseo Someori Gukbap: Konjiam-eup, Konjiam-eup / Suyuk / 031-763-1949

3.Accommodation

Gwangju Hanok Village: Mokhyeon-dong / 031-766-9677
Konjiam Twin House: Jangsim-ri, Konjiam-eup / 010-2253-3757 / www.twinhouse.pe.kr
Jeongon Pension: Gwaneum-ri, Toechon-myeon / 031-768-3917 / www.jo-house.co.kr

item.title: In search of Sansa, filled with the filial piety of Yeongjo, Bogwangsa Temple in Goryeongsan, Paju - Paju-si, Gyeonggi-do, Korea
item.description:
Bogwangsa Temple Daeungbojeon

In search of Sansa, filled with the filial piety of Yeongjo, Bogwangsa Temple in Goryeongsan, Paju

Paju-si, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

Do not hesitate to select Jeongjo as the wage that Hyoshim was the most powerful among the kings of Joseon. In addition to Jeongjo, there was a person who conveyed his endless love for his mother throughout his reign, which is Yeongjo, his grandfather. Sukbin Choi, who went to the palace in Musuri and climbed to Sookbin, the first item in the list, is the mother of Yeongjo and the main character of the drama <Dongi>. Bogwangsa Temple is a large temple that was extended to the words obtained by the king of the royal family, as the patrol of the Soryeongwon where Sookbin Choi was asleep. Yeongjo's Hyosim and sights Visit Bogwangsa Temple.

'Dongyi' Sookbin Choi's original review, Goryeongsan Bogwangsa Temple

There are exceptionally many cemeteries in Paju. It is a comfortable sanctuary for the dead and a place of longing for the living. It's ugly, but I think I can't help getting used to it for some reason. The road to Bokwangsa Temple, the original source of the Soryeongwon where Sookbin Choi is asleep, also goes through this path.
Goyang-dong Goyang-dong is bordered by Paju-si. In order to go to Bogwangsa Temple, you have to cross one of the rough heads called Jakbak Pass. The name of the head, which is named because it looks like a head, is quite steep enough to be called “the limit of Paju”.
As soon as you cross the park, you pass right around Bogwangsa Temple. It is a quiet forest path leading to Bogwangsa Temple. Goryeong Mountain, inhabited by Bogwangsa Temple, is a mountain with a divine name. Bogwangsa Temple was originally called Goryeongsa Temple, but since then it has been changed to Bogwangsa Temple. Bogwangsa Temple is a millennium review that was established by Doseon Guksa in the Unified Silla period as a Buddhist temple. Although it burned during the Korean War and the Imjin War, there are still traces of the royal palace touches and cabinets for Daeungbojeon.

Sukbin Choi was originally Musuri, who served Queen Inhyun, the queen of King Sukjong. In 1689, a major incident occurred in which Queen Inhyeon was destroyed. When Hee-bin Jang became queen, she, who served Queen In-hyun, suffered a lot of trouble. Every day, I prayed for the reinstatement of Queen Inhyeon, but one day, after wearing Sukjong's Seung Eun, she went through a longing to reach the status of Vienna, the first item in the list. Her son Yeongjo later became King of the 21st Joseon Dynasty following King Sukjong and King Gyeongjong, but she did not become the queen. This is because Sukjong, who feared that Mr. Heebin Jang's tragedy would be repeated, forbade him to rise from court lady to queen. Was it because of that? During the long reign, Yeongjo tried to win his mother Sukbin Choi as a queen, and upgraded Sukbin's grave to a land palace and Sukbin grave to a major rank. It was from this time that Bogwangsa became involved with the royal family. Youngjo used Bogwangsa as the patrol of the Major General, and concentrated on Daeungbojeon and Manseru. And at the beginning of each month, I went over the park and met my mother. It seems that Yeongjo lowered his head and called it “the digging head” because it looks like this head is split.

Bogwangsa Temple Daewoongbojeon Dragon Head Horror Decoration
Special things to see in Bogwangsa Temple
Bogwangsa Temple is a temple filled with Yeongjo's extreme filial piety. Yeongjo's filial piety is conveyed by Eosilgak and the juniper tree standing in front of it. Eosilgak is a small cabinet that enshrines Sukbin Choi's Youngjeong and his status. On the front and side, the roof of the roof is placed in the middle of a square with a private roof.
Sukbin Choi's spirit and spirit
A bunch of juniper trees are quite standing in front of them. This juniper tree, which is more than 300 years old, is said to have been planted together when Yeongjo created Eosilgak. Would you have wanted to protect your mother on behalf of yourself in Hanyang? It is as if the general standing wearing a cloak is wearing a cloak.
A 300-year-old juniper tree that is said to have been planted by Yeongjo
In addition, traces of Yeongjo can be found all over Bogwangsa Temple. Yeongjo largely tackled Boungsa Temple's Daeungbojeon and Manseru, and engraved his writings on the Daeungbojeon plaque. The hanging signboard of Daeungbojeon is currently known as the handwriting of Yeongjo. Daewoongbojeon and Manseru are the special traces of Yeongjo's hand, since Yeongjo was in the middle of the Korean War and was not burning during the Korean War.
Daewoongbojeon signboard, known as the handwriting of Yeongjo
Daewoongbojeon, which sits on a pile of stones, goes well with the mountains of Goryeong Mountain. Bogungsa Temple Daeungbojeon has a unique exterior wall that cannot be found in other temples. In other temples, most of the walls are lime-painted, except for the frontal gates. In Bogwangsa Temple, Daeungbojeon is surrounded by wooden panels that surround the left and right sides. In addition, murals on the 10 panel walls are a mixture of Buddhist paintings and folk paintings.
Banya Yongseon on the wall of Daeungbojeon in Bogwangsa Temple
There are three people carrying a large rock in which white dragons and white dragons are sitting, as well as a half-night boat that goes on a trip to the paradise. have. Also noticeable is the white tiger you can often meet in folk paintings. Looking around the mural is like watching a painting exhibition at an art museum.
Elephant painted on the wall of Daeungbojeon, Bogwangsa Temple
You can't miss the wooden fish hanging on the mansuru. Along with Beomjong, Beopgo, and Unpan, the woodenfish is one of the objects used in Buddhist rituals.
Manseru panoramic view
Bokwangsa's neck is probably the closest one you can see. The head is dragon and the tail is fish. In a word, it seems to be ascending to become a spokesperson for Eoseongseongryong. The faded look is very impressive.
A long-necked octopus
Looking at the garden of dead people

In addition to the road from Goyang-dong to Bogwang-sa, there is a road beyond Hyeum-ryeong to Yongmi-ri in Paju. Before the Hui Eum-ryeong, there was a place where Chinese envoys stayed for a day before entering Hanyang, and there was a wall hall where the soldiers of the Ming Dynasty longevity Yi Yeo-song defeated the Japanese army during the Imjin War. Paju Yongmi-ri Maaeui statue and conquering Yeojin and building the 9 northeastern provinces also met the tomb of General Yoon Kwan in the Goryeo period.

Paju Yongmi-ri Maae Fu Statue

Standing at the foot of the eastern foot of Yongamsa Temple, the statue of Maae-i Buddha in Yongmi-ri, Paju, is a typical stone statue of the Goryeo Dynasty, which is designated as Treasure No. 93. It is a unique Buddha statue engraved on a huge natural rock wall with a magical technique and made with a separate neck, head, and shade. After moving a large stone and placing it on a natural rock wall, the Buddha's face was carved. The stone Buddha on the left is a godly figure wearing a round shade and holding a lotus flower. It is a stone Buddha that tells the story of the king's 13th king, King Seonjong's concubine, the original shrine of King Seongjong, who gave birth to Wang Yun after giving birth to the request of a high priest.

Neck, head and lampshade were raised on a natural rock

The two Buddhas close their eyes and look at the Yongmyiri Municipal Park Cemetery across the street. It is a place where the story of the birth of Seokbul is passed down, but now it is as if praying in prayer of the paradise of the dead.

Stone Buddha overlooking the Yongmyiri Municipal Park Cemetery
Travel information

Bogwangsa Temple
Address: 87, Bogwang-ro 474beon-gil, Gwangtan-myeon, Paju-si, Gyeonggi-do
Contact: 031-948-7700, www.bokwangsa.net

1.Access

* Self-driving

Outer Ring Road, Tongil-ro IC → toward Munsan → Turn right at Goyang-dong at Daeja 3-way intersection → Goyang 2nd Bridge → Goyang-dong → Turn right at Provincial Road No. 367 toward Bogwangsa Temple → Yeongbak Pass → Bogwangsa Temple

* public transport

Take bus 333 from Gupabal Station on Subway Line 3 and get off in front of Bogwangsa Temple

2. Restaurants around

Countryside Barley Rice House: Sanchaejeongsik / 32-22, Bogwang-ro 471beon-gil, Gwangtan-myeon, Paju-si / 031-948-7169

Barley head: Barley Rice / 51 Yeongjang-ri, Gwangtan-myeon, Paju-si / 031-948-1012
Eunjin Restaurant: Baekban / 36, Gisan-ro, Gwangtan-myeon, Paju-si / 031-948-5241

3.Accommodation

Youleisure Town: 877, Bogwang-ro, Gwangtan-myeon, Paju-si / 031-948-6161

Palace of Dreams Hotel: 48, Bogwang-ro 600beon-gil, Gwangtan-myeon, Paju-si / 031-949-5120

Day Garden Pension: 264, Jaunseowon-ro, Court-eup, Paju-si / 031-959-8853

item.title: Enjoy adventure by becoming a flying squirrel in the deep forest, Yongin Natural Recreation Forest - Yongin-si, Gyeonggi-do, Korea
item.description:
Ecore Adventure, flying like a flying squirrel

Enjoy adventure by becoming a flying squirrel in the deep forest, Yongin Natural Recreation Forest

Yongin-si, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

“Yah ~” “Exciting!”

Children's exciting cry echoes through the forest. It is a flying squirrel that can move from tree to tree in an instant. The expression that was scared of the first adventurous adventure suddenly changed to a serious expression. This is an eco-venture designed to help you enjoy the adventure by picking old trees. It is a different adventure to enjoy forest and nature with minimal facilities.

Deep mountain adventure
The Yongin Natural Recreation Forest, Eco-D Venture, tends to be full on the weekends, but it's easy to make a reservation during the week. However, it may be convenient to make a reservation in advance, as it may not be available for group reservations.
Experienced students receiving safety training

Make a reservation with the 10 o'clock experience and go to Eco-D Venture. The morning forest road is absolutely refreshing. It is available six times a day, at 10 am, 11 am, 2 pm, 3 pm, 4 pm, and 5 pm. Each seat has 20 people except 5 pm. Even in the woods, it's hot in the middle of the day, so it's a good idea to make a reservation in the morning or late.

Safety hooks and pulleys must be carefully used
When you arrive at Ecored Venture, check your reservation first, and then wear hard hat, gloves, and safety equipment. Children's gloves are also available, so don't worry. After all safety equipment is worn, safety training is conducted prior to the actual operation. At this time, it tells you how to use the equipment and cautions. When grabbing the pulley used to go on a rope, one hand should hold the pulley and the other hand should hold the string. When the pulley rolls, never bring your hand in front of it, as there is a risk of injury.
How to catch pulleys safely
After completing the training, move to the small practice space located next to you to practice hooking and pulling out the hook and putting on and off the pulley. When a child is young, the grip strength is weak, so it is not easy to use equipment, but if you practice a few times and learn the tips, you can do it yourself.
Monkey Course and Chimpanzee Course
It's finally time for action. For infants, the guardians are watching the first few times, and if you need help, it is a good idea to help right away. If you have multiple visitors, you can hurry up and worry about the back person, so it is good to take time and do it one by one.
Thrilling King Kong course
Courses are divided into monkey, chimpanzee, and king kong courses. The Monkey Course can be challenged for toddlers 5-6 years old, the Chimpanzee Course is for children 7-10 years old, and the King Kong Course is for adults 11 years old and older. The King Kong course is made of taller and more distant trees than the monkey and chimpanzee courses, so it feels quite thrilling. The Monkey Course and Chimpanzee Course do not differ significantly in difficulty, so even toddlers can try the Chimpanzee Course. You can do two courses together or just one, but if you are a king, it is good to try both courses. It is too short for one course, and the children are disappointed because the equipment usage is over.
The feet shake, the more carefully
Muho Descalard climbs up the tree on a ladder, Pathel crosses like a stepping stone by connecting two lines between trees, Filled Ssangju crosses the net, crosses a small house on a tree, and boards from high to low Various adventures await, such as the tyrolien slipping down and the tono passing through a wooden cylinder. The name is strange and difficult, but there is no problem at all without knowing the name of each point. All you have to do is to hang the safety rings one by one and do not hurry and do it slowly.
Landing nicely on a pulley
When I receive safety education, every time a child who is overwhelmed nervously challenges one by one, he gains confidence, feels fun, and brightens his face. It is especially exciting when flying through a tree in a pulley. I feel like I'm Tarzan flying freely through the jungle. After all the courses are over, the children shout “One more time!” With the above-mentioned expression. It takes about an hour to complete safety training and finish the monkey course and chimpanzee course. The duration of the King Kong course is similar. There is no age limit, but you need to be over 110cm tall to challenge.
Passing through the cylinders of the monkey course
Campsite and trails
Many people use Yongin Natural Recreation Forest, but campsites are also popular. Even in the middle of winter, it is difficult to grab a site on the weekend. You can get a feeling of being surrounded by nature by constructing a site naturally by cascading between dense trees and on a mountain slope. It's cumbersome to have your car parked in the parking lot and move your hand luggage, but thanks to it, you can see it separately at night and hear the bugs and camp as naturally as possible.
A campsite surrounded by forest
There are several playgrounds at the entrance to the campsite, all of which are forest playgrounds for children. There are no rides common in apartment complexes. Here, the playground is also “green”. Riding a horse, climbing on a slide of a wooden house, and holding a line on a wooden barrel connected between wooden pillars and crossing it. Even if you play all day, the kids don't seem bored.
Eco-friendly forest playground decorated with wood
Wetland garden for walking
Ecod Venture is located in the innermost part of the recreational forest. On the way, you will naturally pass through the wetlands. The deck is spread over the wetland area, so it is easy to walk lightly. There are also several stairs, but you can also look around with a stroller, mainly made of ramps. The sound of a frog rumbling around a small pond where you can observe lotus flowers, aquatic plants, and insects, and flowers bloom from time to time by collecting wild flowers and native flowers around us. As you climb up the promenade, there are also salamander habitats, as well as signs of “snake vigilance”. Be careful as snakes can actually pass over promenades.
Phytoncide Promenade
The lawn plaza, which is the front yard of the recreational forest, is a place where visitors on the weekend install a mat, tent, and tarp. From last spring, as the weekend visitors were switched to the reservation system, the dense grassy squares were freed up and parking and vehicle congestion problems were eliminated. If you want to enjoy outings on the weekends on the day of the Ecod Ventures and Recreation Forest, you must make a reservation. There is no need to make a separate admission reservation when using the accommodation.
Visitors observing lotus flowers in wetland garden
Yongin Natural Recreation Forest is also a paragliding mecca. Several paragliding specialists are located at the entrance of the recreational forest, and there is an active factory at the top of Jeonggwangsan (563m) that rises behind the recreational forest. On a weekday, a paraglider that seemed rare, flies at once as if it bloomed in the sky on the weekend. The arrival point is just below the recreational forest, so it's interesting to see it landing by turning on the lawn square. There are also two-person experience flights accompanied by experts, so if you are curious, take the courage to challenge.
Paraglider gliding over the grassy square
Travel information

Yongin Natural Recreation Forest
-Address: 220, Chobu-ro, Mohyeon-myeon, Cheoin-gu, Yongin-si, Gyeonggi-do
-Inquiries: 031-336-0040

www.yonginforest.net

Restaurants near

-Cheil Restaurant: Sundaeguk / 11 Baekam-ro 201beon-gil, Baekam-myeon, Cheoin-gu, Yongin-si / 031-332-4608
-Kong Madang: Cheonggukjang / 18, Nampyeong-ro, Yangmyeon, Cheoin-gu, Yongin-si / 031-338-0821

Rooms
-Hotel River: 73, Galcheon-ro 7beon-gil, Giheung-gu, Yongin-si / 031-283-3601 ~ 3

http://www.hotelriver.co.kr/kr/index/
-Q (Q) Hotel: 10-3 Jeondaero 110beon-gil, Pogok-eup, Cheoin-gu, Yongin-si / 031-339-8881 ~ 2

http://www.qhotel.co.kr/

item.title: Winter fairy tale meets in the snowy arboretum, Morning Calm Arboretum - Gapyeong-gun, Gyeonggi-do, Korea
item.description:
Morning Calm Arboretum Moonlight Garden

Winter fairy tale meets in the snowy arboretum, Morning Calm Arboretum

Gapyeong-gun, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

When it was snowy winter, I visited the morning calm arboretum, a winter kingdom that glistens with a brilliant autumnal glow. Many people visit the arboretum even in this season thanks to the “Five Starlight Garden” held every winter. When the darkness fell, I followed the colored lights blooming. It is also suitable for a quiet downtown dating course. A winter festival of lights held at this time of year. The five-pointed starlight garden, which celebrated its eighth anniversary this year, will continue until March 15, when the vegetation is asleep.

I visited a quiet morning serene arboretum before lighting the five-colored starlight garden. Morning Calm Arboretum, which settled at the foot of Gapyeongsan Mountain in Gapyeong, Gyeonggi-do, has been loved by the public since it was selected as a filming location for various movies and dramas. The arboretum itself is also an attractive destination, thanks to various attractions of Gapyeong such as Churyeongsan, Petite France, and Nami Island.

The story of the colorful starlight dancing when the darkness falls

Thanks to this, the five-colored Starlight Garden in winter is followed by the Wildflower Exhibition and Spring Flower Festival in spring, the Cornus and Mugunghwa Festival in summer, and the Chrysanthemum Festival and the Autumn Leaves Festival in autumn. The four seasons of the Arboretum are a series of transformation. However, the admission fee is quite challenging. Prices based on weekends: 9,000 won for regular students, 6500 won for middle and high school students, and 5500 won for children. On the weekends during the Five Star Garden, there are a lot of visitors. If you want to enjoy the festival more leisurely, consider finding it on weekdays. You can go around the arboretum in about an hour, so if you come by 8 o'clock, there is no big crowd to enjoy the festival.

Morning Calm Arboretum before lighting
To do this, it is a good idea to take a look at the brochure located at the arboretum ticket office. I decided to take a round tour of the Morning Calm Arboretum before dark. After passing the ticket office, the first hometown garden welcomes you. This is the first time to announce that you have come to the Morning Calm Arboretum. When the day comes, you pass through the light tunnel to light up and walk into the winter fairy tale. After that, a pair of cygnus facing the large maple tree touches the waiting bonsai garden. It is a place that is loved as a point of photography for lovers.
Morning Calm Arboretum before lighting
In the bright sun, the calm morning morning arboretum, as its name suggests, wakes up as darkness comes. If you look at the arboretum when there is still sunlight than it is after dark, you can see a clearer difference. On Saturdays, until 11 PM, everything else lights up until 9 PM. The time when the light comes on differs little by little around the sunset. Still, the light comes on before the day is completely over. It's fun to take pictures while watching the difference in light between bright and dark.
Lit white flowers and roses glowing when the light comes on
Sweet girl, walk through the garden in our fairy tale
Turn left at the bonsai garden to the Eden Garden. A cafe <Good Morning> and a restaurant <Breakfast Restaurant> are located on this street. <Wildflower Scented Restaurant> is not open in winter. The cafe where you can have a cup of tea while melting the cold gets more people as the lighting time gets closer.
Cafe in the Morning Calm Arboretum to relieve cold
Besides cafés and restaurants, there are simple shelters to relax in the arboretum. Those who have prepared lunchboxes can eat here.
Shelter in the Morning Calm Arboretum to relieve cold
The most eye-catching thing in the Eden Garden is an umbrella with starlight. Umbrellas hanging on the trees create a dramatic atmosphere with sparkling stars.
Umbrella of Eden Garden newly installed this year
Wait here! One advanced piece of information for those who are cold. On the way from Eden Garden to Hagyeong Garden, remember the seat or the greenhouse.
‘Great greenhouse’ located at the base of Eden Garden
A space greenhouse where flowers can grow fine even in the midst of a bitter winter! It is also the best to dissolve human body. You can watch flowers and melt your body. Remember to prepare for a date.
‘Great greenhouse’ located at the base of Eden Garden

Soon, we face Hakyung Garden, which is considered as the main garden of the Morning Calm Arboretum. There is no place to put your eyes on the colorful lights. When you climb the observatory, the stars spread out at a glance. The mouth opens to the fairy-tale scenery scattered in front of reality. It was cold, so I never thought about it!

Hagyeong Garden, called the main garden of Morning Calm Arboretum
After walking around Hagyeong Garden for a long time, we enter the skyway. It is a path leading to the Moonlight Garden, but slender larchs are beautifully dressed up and waiting.
Golden mushroom on the sky
These are large and small mushrooms blooming in the flower bed, and Cupid's arrows attract attention. It is a familiar scene to line up to take pictures.
Cupid's arrow, popular among lovers
Then it passes through the forest of lights and touches the moonlight garden. A small church and baby angels guarding it are greeted to come. Baby elephants and Rudolph reindeer are also playing.
Fairy tale walking path, sky path
The Five-Colored Starlight Garden is a winter fairy tale on the other hand. Even those who don't know what to write can understand. A deep winter night, why not take a precious person's hand and leave for a light festival to melt the long winter?
At the end of the sky path
Moreover, the theme of this five-color starlight garden exhibition is 'with LOVE'. Is it a good winter fairy tale to confess to a loved one?
The theme of the 8th Five Starlight Garden Exhibition, 'with LOVE'
However, it does not light up when it is snowing or raining. Even if the weather gets rough after entering, it is impossible to refund the admission ticket. Make sure to check the weather forecast.
The entrance to the skyway, the pumpkin carriage in the morning square
Cherry Blossom Tunnel Walking in Winter

item.title: Filming location of “Gwansang”, famous mountain snow plum and ginkgo tree at Yongmunsa Temple - Yangpyeong-gun, Gyeonggi-do, Korea
item.description:
The view from the front yard of Naekyung's house through the silver grass

Filming location of “Gwansang”, famous mountain snow plum and ginkgo tree at Yongmunsa Temple

Yangpyeong-gun, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

Seolmaejae is the filming location for the movie <Kwannwan>, the best topic in the second half of 2013. It was a time when the family of Naekyung (Song Kang-ho) lived comfortably. Looking down from the silver grass hill in front of the house, the anxiety disappears. In the autumn outing, a nearby Yongmunsa Temple with 1,100-year-old ginkgo trees is also recommended. This is a temple that the Yangyang army in <Contemplative> visited twice before and after the Gyeyujeong.

Looking for a contemplative town in Chittaksan
It is November. The wind is quite cold along the Namhan River. Everywhere is uneven. It is late autumn. It's perfect because the pickling is in harmony. In particular, Yangpyeong is more busy in autumn because it has many famous mountains. Yumyeongsan Mountain, Yongmunsan Mountain, and Jungmisan Mountain show off slightly different charms. Then there are different statues on the mountain. Pungsu geography is a contemplation of nature.
A house of inner diameter located in the middle of a silver grass field
Not long ago, the movie <Contemplation> became popular. It was the tenth in the Korean film industry, attracting 9 million audiences. The actors' strong acting also stood out, but the material of ornamental was also a significant influence on the box office. <Contemplation> is set in the background of the sedation. This was the case when the Sooyang Grand Army removed Kim Jong-seo, etc., and took Danjong's throne. At the center of its history, the ornamental contest follows Kim Nae-kyung's gaze.
Autumn scenery along the road to the location where <Swanaejae>
The first scene is the path that Gisaeng Yeon-hong (Hye-soo Kim) visits the inner diameter. The inner diameter lives like a Moorim coriander hiding in the middle of the night. There may be a factor called the family of a rebellious family, but I wonder if I already knew my contemplation and lived in hiding. Nevertheless, what about that talent? People come by hearing the word of mouth. Parasitic lotus is one of them. It is an intention to try to make a lot of money by using the talent of inner diameter. They find themselves disguised as merchants, but they cannot fool the current contemplative.
The famous Seolmaejae area is a hidden silver grass spot.
“The light of the drawing turns and the lips with red lips are shameless. . ”
The autumn scenery on the way to the house of Naekyung at first glance resembles the red lips of the red. It is the Seolmaejae Passage, which is the foot of the famous mountain. It is named after plum blossoms bloom even when it snows a lot. Since 1999, a private recreational forest has been in operation on the ridge. It is well known to camping enthusiasts with its log cabin and auto camping site. Within the recreational forest, there were Damo Forest and Soseono Forest. Drama <Damo> and <Jumong> were filmed here.
Dark autumn leaves between the silver grass fields attract attention.
The filming location of <Contemplative> passes through the entrance to the Seolmaejae Recreation Forest and goes up a little further to the banner. When you reach the ridge, there are ATV rental stores and small container stores. There is a road towards the mountain next to the kiosk and there is a breaker. This is the head to the location. If you walk around 30 minutes by car, you can see the house of the inner diameter in <Contemplation>.
Sometimes a single autumn leaf is enough
Thatched house in silver grass field
At the entrance of Naekyung's house, the entrance of Imdo is overlooked by trees growing in laughter. Although the leaves of Ebisan sometimes appear, it is not satisfactory. Fortunately, the cool landscape opens as soon as we make up for the regret. On the left side of the road, Yongmunsan and Baekwoonbong boast great pride. It is a mountain that can feel autumn. Below that is the Namhan River stem. As if taking a breath, stop walking and look at you for a long time.
You and your house are covered with planks
When you turn back, it's a silver grass tingling. It is a sign that the house of the inner diameter is not far. Soon it is the first crossroads. There are signs on the three-way intersection, B, D course, and Wangnam course. It looks like a three-way street, but it is actually a crossroad. There is another side road behind the sign. If you take the Wangnam course, you can walk while enjoying the surrounding scenery. In particular, there was a tree in autumn with autumn leaves, and the sloping silver grass field and the surrounding mountains are impressive.
The house of the inner diameter of the movie <Contemplation>
If you walk a little further with that afterimage, you will see Samgeori. If you cross your head slightly uphill to the right, it is the back door of the house. In the movie, the path that Yeonhong was looking for is the left side road just behind the B and D course signs. I can see the silver grass field and the house of the inner diameter grows up on the hill.
A silver grass field beyond the back door seen from the thatched house floor
The house of Naekyung was built on the flat of the ridge. Two houses with ‘Yu-wa’ and ‘thatched’ have been placed as ‘ㄴ’. The bosom is the courtyard. In the scene where the inner diameter and Pangheon (Cho Jung-seok), who received money from Yeonhong, boiled a teeming chicken, are young. On one side, there is a small arch made of ocher like the trace. A silver grass rises along the ridge through the back door, and the autumn landscape spreads out through the front door. In the old days, it was used as a filming location for the drama <The Garden of the Winds>. This is where Kim Hong-do and Shin Yun-bok met. It has recently been used as a filming location for the drama <Goddess of Fire> after the movie <Contemplation>. Since modern civilization is not close, it is a good place to shoot historical dramas.
The mood of the autumn day is layering.
Ginkgo biloba silver grass, Yongmunsa temple
The area around Naekyung's house is a silver grass spot that attracts people, just like those who visited to see the contemplation. At one time, Hwa Jeon-min even worked the land. In the old days, there was also a dressage where horses were raised. The famous name of the famous mountain is Mayu Mountain. That is why humans are rare and secluded. It is worth taking a look at the surrounding scenery to enjoy the autumn mood.
Walking through the silver grass field leads to the famous mountain
You can take a little more steps. Paragliding active factories are not far from Limdo. In the active factory, you can see five pine trees matching the silver grass field, which is also a famous location. In the movie <The Man of the King>, Jangsaeng (Gam Woo-sung) and Gong-gil (Lee Jun-ki) played the final play. After the active factory, it leads to the top of Mt. Many people do not know the way to go to the silver grass field of <Kwannwan> because Mt.
Yongmunsan Tourist Complex
If you miss the autumn leaves than silver grass, it is better to turn your foot toward Yongmun Mountain than famous one. It takes about 30 minutes by car from Seolmaejae to Yongmunsan (it's too much to use public transportation). If there is silver grass in Seolmaejae, Yongmunsan is the autumn leaves. The best among them is the 1,100-year-old ginkgo tree of Yongmunsa Temple. As I foretell the fact, when I get close to the tourist attractions of Yongmunsan, ginkgo trees are greeted. Some still have a blue color, but the golden yellow color marks the peak of autumn. The road leading up to the entrance to Yongmunsan Mountain is perfect for a drive course.
Beautiful tulip trees in autumn
Ginkgo trees lined up from the parking lot of Yongmunsan to the entrance of the forest road. Ginkgo leaves fall off and a yellow road is like a fairy tale. A roadside ornamental man holds the passersby. As I passed the filming location of <Contemplative>, my heart moved. The foliage of vermilion tulip trees around the mall is also beautiful. It is one of the most coveted autumn leaves, but it is a relatively less known tree.
Road to Yongmunsan Tourist Complex
The 1,100 year old tree where the wind passes by
Walk up 1km along the forest path to Yongmunsa Temple. As the valley opens, red maple leaves appear instead of ginkgo trees. Yongmunsa Temple was founded in 2 years (913) by King Silla of Silla. It has nothing to do with the Suyangdae army in <Contemplation>. At the age of thirty (1447), he was ordered by King Sejong and first visited Yongmunsa to build a preservation for his mother, Queen Soheon, Sim. When he was forty years old three years after he was crowned the throne, he visited Yongmunsa Temple once more to replace the temple. The stricken distress (1453) to end the discontinuation was an incident in the meantime. It is the ginkgo tree of Yongmunsa Temple that I watched all day after day. Under the shade, the last line of the inner diameter in <Contemplation> comes to mind.
Yongmun Bridge with autumn leaves in harmony
“I only looked at the faces of people, not the times. … I need to see the wind ... It is the wind that makes the waves. You just rode high waves for a while. … Like the waves coming high break one day. ”
The color of the road to Yongmunsa Temple
Yongmunsa Ginkgo tree is said to have been planted on the way to Mt. Its history also matches the inner diameter. It is said that the costume ambassador's staff sprouted and became a ginkgo tree, and there is a legend that he made a sound whenever there was a big problem in the country. It is said that the Japanese army set fire to Yongmunsa Temple during the Korean War against the American Army (1907), but did not burn only ginkgo trees. You can tell by facing the ginkgo tree. It is not a tree that will be shaken by some interference. The wind is also dignified to pass. It's worth it as the leader reaches 1,100 years. It is about 42m high and the circumference of the base is 15.2m. It is the oldest and largest ginkgo tree in Korea. Even if you climb the stairs and face the Daeungjeon Hall, you cannot reach the height of the tree. So, Yongmunsa Temple is about 1,100 years ago.
Autumn mountain with foliage over Yongmunsa Yosachae
Autumn leaves are likely to be full on the second weekend of November this year. On the first weekend in November, the greenery was so dark that those who visited Yongmunsa temple devoured the regret. On the contrary, the autumn leaves of Yongmunsan will be more colorful. It culminated in late October through early November. If the normal person, Gaesupbong, is busy, a light hike from Yongmunsa Temple to Senate Temple is also not bad. If it's overwhelming, it's good to chew the words of Jinhyeong's son Jinhyung. He replied to the question of what was the most difficult thing to do after he stopped working in the past.
“It was not to resign from fate.”
It's about an hour or two of walking along a certain path.
1,100 years old ginkgo tree at Yongmunsa Temple

item.title: Peace to settle on the Korean Peninsula with classical music, Yeoncheon DMZ International Music Festival - Yeoncheon-gun, Gyeonggi-do, Korea
item.description:
KBS Symphony Orchestra

Peace to settle on the Korean Peninsula with classical music, Yeoncheon DMZ International Music Festival

Yeoncheon-gun, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

From July 25th to August 2nd, 'Yeoncheon DMZ International Music Festival' will be held in Yeoncheon-gun, Gyeonggi-do for 9 days. The main stage of the festival is the Jeokgok-ri Seonje Historic Site, Hantan River Tourist Site, and Sureul Art Hall. This year, with the theme of “coexistence,” about 40 musicians, including Sook-ryun Park, will produce chords. Orchestra performances, concerts by artists from around the world, fringe concerts, visiting concerts, music academies, and classical lectures are held throughout the music festival. I believe that the feast of beautiful classics created by travelers from Yeoncheon-gun and artists from around the world will greatly contribute to the settlement of peace on the Korean Peninsula.
The tragedy of the Korean War, which broke out in 1950, ended on July 27, 1953, three years later. That day was the day the Armistice Agreement was signed. The formal name of the Armistice Agreement is the Agreement on the Military Armistice of the Republic of Korea, with the Commander-in-Chief of the United Nations as one side and the Supreme Commander of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Commander of the People's Republic of China as the other. On this day, the UN, North Korean and Chinese forces signed the Armistice Agreement under Article 5, Section 63. Korea, a party to the Korean War, was excluded. This ended the war that lasted for three years and a month, but demilitarized zones (DMZs), literally banned areas of armament, formed on the Korean Peninsula.
According to data from DMZ Museum, the demilitarized zone of the Korean Peninsula is 155 miles (about 248 km) from Gyodongdo Island on the western side of Yeseong River and Hangang River to Panmunjom in the southern part of Kaesong, through Cheorwon and Geumhwa in the central region to Goseong Myeongho (Unification Observatory) on the east coast. ), Which means 2 km between the north and the south, about 300 million pyeong (3,360 km) of the buffering zone, centered on the Military Demarcation Line (MDL). You can see the DMZ from the key observation deck north of Yeoncheon-gun. You must bring your ID to visit the Key Observation Deck.
It's a place of heartbreaking history, but you can't just stay in the past. Yeoncheon-gun has repeatedly transformed itself into the number one spot in security tourism for peace and reunification, and has been holding the Yeoncheon DMZ International Music Festival since 2011 as one of its new efforts. The DMZ is also the site of the division of the Fatherland, but the festival focuses on classical music every year in the hope of being reborn as a site of reunification, peace, and ecology.
Students participating in the music academy walking the iron fence next to the key observatory

Starting on the opening concert of Yeoncheon Culture and Sports Center on Saturday, July 25, the music school 'Music Academy' with the best classical artists at home and abroad, 'DMZ experience' that allows you to know the reality of the divided country and experience the military border area directly ',' Mini Peace Concert 'that sings peace and hope,' Nara Love Concert ', which wishes for peace on the Korean Peninsula and around the world,' Artist Concert Series' where artists full of personality perform, and 'Specials' held by top artists from around the world Following the guest concert, it will be finished with a 'closing concert' where all participating artists participate.

Let's look at each program in more detail. The opening concert will be performed by Mostly Philharmonic Orchestra (Director Park Sang-hyun), Yeoncheon YES Orchestra (Director Seo Hong-jun), Pianist Manuel Obregon and Violinist Frederick Morrow. Here, the stages of singers Cho Yong-nam and Hyo-beom Shin are familiar. In addition, the music school 'Music Academy', which is held throughout the festival, will be held with private lessons, master classes, and celebrity lectures of piano, violin, cello, and viola parts from elementary to general.

Also, it is a pity to miss the “Artist Concert Series,” where you can fully appreciate the performances of pianist Ivan Yanakov, Seonghoon Kim, Eurk Demus, and cellist Dorel Bodoreanu. It is held at Herb Village Olive Hall. For those with various musical tastes, fringe concerts filled with various genre performances and performances, such as classical, pop, jazz, song, and percussion performances, add to the richness.

Yeoncheon DMZ International Music Festival 2015 <Photo Source: DMZ International Music Festival Secretariat>
On August 1st (Sat), 7 days before the closing day, the closing concert will be held at all Yeoncheonsu Leul Art Hall with all participating artists. Not only foreign performers who showed their appearance at the opening performance, but also domestic performers all appeared, and they gave the music of excitement and harmony.
Mostly Philharmonic Orchestra
At the DMZ International Music Festival, Yeoncheon-gun recommends destinations called “The Five Spots of Security” and “The Seven Spots of Nature” for travelers who are impressed by the classics. The 5th security refers to the hurricane observatory, key observatory, promotion OP, 1st tunnel, and 1,21 armed defense invasion route. The seven natural scenery are the Imjin River Tourist Site, the Hantan River Tourist Site, the Baekhak Reservoir, the Dongmakgol Amusement Park, the Jain Waterfall, the Ancient Mountain, and the Twelve Creek.
Commemorative photo of students participating in Music Academy
On the other hand, if you're traveling with elementary school children, check out the Jeokgok Seonsa Museum, located in Jeokgok-ri, the home of the Paleolithic people 350,000 years ago. What is more eye-catching is the model of human ancestors reproduced in vivid form. Tumai, the ancestor of humanity about 7 to 6 million years ago, Australopithecus who lived in eastern and southern Africa 4 to 2 million years ago, Homo erectus that appeared about 1.8 million years ago, appeared in Africa about 200,000 years ago Homo sapiens and others welcome visitors.
In the cave paintings section, it is interesting to reproduce murals found in Lasco Cave in France and Altamira Cave in Spain. If you go to the outdoor experience center, you will be waiting for the fist ax making experience.
Exhibits at the Jeokok Seonsa Museum 'The Great March of Human Evolution'

item.title: Can you hear me, the miracle of tomorrow ringing in Paju - Paju-si, Gyeonggi-do, Korea
item.description:
I look forward to the day when the bridge will run to the other side

Can you hear me, the miracle of tomorrow ringing in Paju

Paju-si, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

In June 1950, the ground rang with a loud bombardment. Han River, Imjin River, Gongneung Stream, and Munsan Stream. Paju, which was called “the village on the bank,” had many roads in Oga. Today, 68 years later, Paju, arising from the pain of a dog-legged bridge, is a space that contains happiness, such as a museum and a garden cafe, touching people's wounds and dreaming of a miracle tomorrow.
Drawing a unification on the broken bridge, Skywalk
31 December 1950. The steam locomotive of Gyeongui Line, heading from North to South, was shot at 1020 rounds and stopped at Jangdan Station. The train, which had since been left in the DMZ, was not moved to Imjingak in 2006.
Steam locomotive at Jangdan Station on the Gyeongui Line, where it has been lost (Registered Cultural Property No. 78)
The Dokgae Bridge, an old railroad line connecting the old Gyeongui Line connecting Uncheon-ri, Munsan-eup, Paju-si and Nosang-ri, Jangdan-myeon, was also destroyed by bombing. From 1953 to 1998 when the Unification Bridge was opened from 1953, when the armistice was restored to allow the captives to return to the armistice, Dokgae Bridge, which was the only channel connecting the north of the civilian ship and Panmunjom, was a symbol of tragedy and pain. .
Imjingak served as the embankment of South Korea during the Korean War.
How to soothe the wounds that Ching Ching has wound. In December 2016, the dog's legs were refurbished in hopes that the scab would sit on the wind and hope for the hope to come together. Using the remaining five piers, the skywalk “Tomorrow's Miracle Sound”, which is 105m long and 5m wide, reproduces the iron bridge before the war. The two-story structure consists of the past, present, and future sections. Anyone can stay on Skywalk located within the civilian access control line without restrictions during the viewing time.
I hope the miracle will sound again at the Paju Dogak Bridge
As if starting a journey, the past section of the Gyeongui Line steam locomotive carriage can be imagined as an urgent and fierce scene sitting on a chair in a room while viewing a black and white photograph of the situation. At a train station in Seoul, where everything is ruined, is the brother and sister in a black and white photograph looking for food by waving empty cans?
The past section that lets you start your time journey
If you step outside and step on the rail, you will see the current section of the wooden deck. You can observe the bottom of the bridge through a special glass on the floor.
Looking forward on the second floor of Skywalk, the end of the future section, North Korea can be seen through the red markers that indicate the bullet marks left during the Korean War on the pier and beyond.
The day before, even though the temperature was quite high, it snowed enough to accumulate overnight.
I wish tomorrow a miracle will sound
The sound of a train ringing a horn into the landscape across the river seems to be heard.
People who have made many wishes until the tree, which was a seedling, grew
Memories of the whole family, Korea Museum of Modern and Contemporary History
I visited the Museum of Modern and Contemporary History to learn more about Korea's modern and contemporary history by looking at the dog's legs.
Korea Museum of Modern and Contemporary History sent an invitation to time travel
Korea's 20th-century culture has undergone exceptional fluctuations. From 1910 to the 40's when Japan lost control, the 1950s had a painful 6/25 war. 'Let's live well' was from the 1970s to the 1980s, when people from all over the world joined together.
A museum that seems to have moved the entire village as it is.
In hopes of not forgetting those days for a long time, I moved over 70,000 pieces of various visual artifacts collected in 30 years to Heyri Village in 2005.
Difficult times when it was a wish to eat three meals
The Korean Museum of Modern and Contemporary History, which smells the smell of the past from the entrance, consists of one basement floor and three stories above the ground, and is the first museum of modern and contemporary history in Korea that reproduces a village of different eras for each floor.
Election posters that gathered the hardest
“I was hungry. Yesterday, the only thing I felt hungry the day before was that my only wish was to eat three full meals. ” The grandmother, who walked the streets of the 1960s at Pungmul Hall on the 1st basement floor, looks at the rice bowl and talks to her grandson.
Everyone has a memory that comes to mind
One bowl of spicy soup and two bottles of soju in two bowls of Seolleongtang. Even when I summed it all up, it was 990 won. The grandson grabs the hands of a grandmother whose eyes are reddened by the thought of working late into the night and feeding the envelope again to feed her a bite.
Warmth that can be felt only when delivered by hand
In the age of changing along the stairs, the dressmaker's dress, the mother's high school days, and the dad's school uniform pass. “Uh, I used to eat this often when I was in school! Wow, nice to meet you. ” Laughing flowers bloom on the faces of the Warr family in front of the grocery store. With a lighter mind, he steps toward the nearby 93 Museum.
Even hard times pass, it becomes a memory to laugh
Laughing flowers in full bloom with portrait painting and trick art, 93 Museum
The young man, who was eager to paint, divided his first salary of 3,000 won and bought a picture. The genre that was the cheapest at the time was portrait painting. After 15 years, the pictures were piled up, and there were several rare works that were rarely seen in Korea. The 93 Museum is a collection of over 1,000 pictures and the site of Paju.
Choi Je-woo, the founder of Donghak, learned from textbooks
The portraits that started to be collected are displayed on the 3rd floor under the theme of 'Kwannang', and the photographs of the famous Joseon parasites, including Choi Hae-woo, the founder of Donghak, greet with intense color as if restored.
Joseon ’s parasites who were idols
You can see not only the past, but also portraits of celebrities such as modern politicians, and some art works of ex-president Chun Doo-hwan are exhibited.
Portrait of comfort women
On the 1st and 2nd floors, trick art and novel modern art are exhibited so that you can see them with your own eyes and become part of the painting yourself.
It's only time to make people
Marilyn Monroe, which has a different body weight depending on the angle, and if you've been interested in going around in front of the picture you're wearing and taking off, it's time to enter the submarine exploration room and enjoy the painting in earnest.
Mysterious trick art that is part of the picture
On the breathtaking bridge, posing in the water overlooking the dark water, taking pictures of each other, I don't know how long it will take. If you have a commentator around you, be sure to hand over the camera. You can enjoy more realistic trick art from the skillful angles accumulated through numerous careers.
Depending on the angle, it can be expressed more realistically.
A sip of coffee in a handsome tree-filled garden, Soulwon
Time to finish the journey that has crossed the times and spaces. Let's settle down in a quiet garden café that sometimes filled our hearts. It takes about 10 minutes by car to reach Soulwon. Soulwon is made of bonsai, garden stones, and garden water collected for 20 years in hopes that the energy of purification given by plants will be transmitted and become a “garden full of laughter”.
Soulwon in a quiet landscape
Before looking around the garden, you lay down your heart in the rough comfort of a stone tower built with basalt. It is still chilly. Even in the season when spring is hard to find its place, bonsai in the greenhouse will soothe the sadness. As the day unfolds, the artificial waterfall also emits a stream of water.
The water of an artificial waterfall marks the beginning of spring
If you combine the garden trees and bonsai here, you will reach 25,000.
Inside a warm greenhouse full of green
Trees that have seen their history and countless people coming and going around them in the same place for a long time. Chop the whole heart into trouble and hang it at the end of the peacock leaves, filling the empty heart with oak leaves.
The integrity of the tree makes fruit
As he listens to the thoughts of finding himself, the tree absorbs all those tears and embraces secrets to wipe out young leaves every year.

item.title: Travel around the world without a passport, special district of Ansan Multicultural Village - Ansan-si, Gyeonggi-do, Korea
item.description:
Tourists experiencing traditional clothes at Ansan City World Culture Experience Center

Travel around the world without a passport, special district of Ansan Multicultural Village

Ansan-si, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

Ansan City is the region where foreigners gather the most in Korea. As of February 2019, there are 8,500 foreign residents in 107 countries. Of these, 21,000 people from 57 countries live in Wongok-dong. The area around Wongok-dong was recognized for this uniqueness, and was designated as the first multicultural village in Korea in May 2009. And 10 years. The Ansan Multicultural Village Special Zone entices travelers into a small world in Korea that leaves without a passport.
In Ansan Multicultural Village Special Zone, there are many signboards with large local language and small English and Korean language.
Ansan Multicultural Village Special Zone is connected to Ansan Station on Subway Line 4. After exiting Exit 1 and passing Jungang-daero, you can see a multicultural food street. Even if it is not a signboard on the road, you can see that it is a special district in Ansan Multicultural Village. This is because restaurants, shops, and other amenities such as banks mostly use foreign language signs. The expression is written in large local languages and small in English and Korean. The design and color are reflected in the characteristics of each country, so it is confusing whether it is Korea, Vietnam, or Russia. Oga also contributes to the unusual scenery of foreign languages mixed with their conversation.
The symbol of Ansan Multicultural Village, “Kidaria”
Ghana traditional doll aqua bar displayed at Ansan City World Culture Experience Center
First, let's go to the Ansan City World Culture Experience Center. Opened as a multicultural public relations learning center in 2012 to show the power of diversity, it exhibits more than 1,400 pieces of musical instruments, dolls, masks, and rides collected from over 50 countries, and uses these exhibits to experience the traditional culture of each country. Decorated with a space to do. If the singing ball that rubs the rim of a kalimba called a brass piano and a brass-like body is a musical instrument for all adult children, among 130 dolls, the Ghanaian traditional doll aqua bar known as the model of the movie `` ET '' and `` Russian Dooly Cheburashka, which leads to 'is popular. Japanese traditional rides such as Hanetsuki and Kendama are also interesting. Kendama plays by vertically moving a ball suspended in a row into the groove under the handle. Hanetsuki, who exchanges feathered balls with a wooden racket, is a play that girls enjoyed wearing kimonos during the New Year's Day.
Ansan City World Culture Experience Center where you can experience the traditional culture of each country using exhibits collected from over 50 countries
It is a place not to be missed, with over 250 traditional costumes, including British guards' uniforms and Uzbekistan traditional wedding costumes. At Ansan City World Culture Experience Center, various tutors from various countries, such as China, Vietnam, Japan, Congo, and Nigeria, take turns conducting experience programs. Individual viewing is from 10 am to 5 pm (closed on public holidays), and viewing and experience is free. Group tours are held three times a day (10:00, 11:00, 13:30) and the experience hall website ( https://mc.ansan.go.kr ). Be sure to bring a brochure showing foreign restaurants in the Ansan Multicultural Village Special Zone.
Multicultural food street with sculptures in the shape of plates and chopsticks

It is regrettable to skip the food while talking about the special district of Ansan Multicultural Village. It is a neighborhood where people of various nationalities gather, so the food is rich. With a focus on multicultural food streets, there are 184 restaurants serving different countries, including China, Indonesia, Nepal, India, Vietnam, Thailand, Russia and Uzbekistan. Among them, 62 establishments employ local professional chefs according to the “Local Chef Recommendation System” of the Ansan Foreign Residents Support Headquarters. The advantage is that you can taste local food without going far by plane. The same rice noodles have different tastes from Thai and Vietnamese restaurants, and lamb skewers from Chinese and Uzbek restaurants are completely different.

Restaurant decorated in Russian style
There are many exotic foods in multicultural food streets.
The interior is also different for each country, so depending on which restaurant you go to, you can eat in a completely different atmosphere. Most of the restaurant employees are foreigners, so it's a bit difficult to communicate, but it's interesting because I feel like I've been abroad. Of course, there are no problems with ordering or making calculations. In the multicultural food street, there are as many easy-to-eat Jujeon Buri as the restaurant menu. An adult biceps (yotiao), a Chinese hotteok, and a meat bread (samsa) that is essential at the Russian table that Chinese people enjoy as a substitute for breakfast, fits well in our mouths. I am curious about the taste of duck eggs marinated in salt for more than 20 days and the loach fried whole brown.
Ansan Multicultural Village Special Zone, where exotic festivals are frequent <Photo Credit: Ansan Foreign Resident Support Headquarters>
Exotic festivals are often held in the Ansan Multicultural Village Special Zone. The World Culture Healing Concert is held from April to October. In April, a Cambodian Festival was held to commemorate the New Year of Cambodia, and the World People's Day celebration celebrating the 12th anniversary of this year took place at the Ansan Cultural Plaza in May. For information on various festivals held in the special district of Ansan Multicultural Village, please visit the blog of the Ansan Foreign Residents Support Headquarters ( https://blog.naver.com/ansanfo ).
Hwarang Amusement Park with Hwarang Reservoir
Hwarang Amusement Park is a 2-minute drive from Ansan Station, where Ansan Multicultural Village Special Zone begins. Hwarang Amusement Park, which houses Hwarang Reservoir, has various facilities such as fountain plazas, trails, Gyeonggi Museum of Art, and auto camping. At the entrance, there is also a national symbolic sculpture that introduces various countries around the world as a multicultural city. Ansanrang Auto Camping Site is a camping site in the city with 73 camping sites, glamping sites and caravan sites. To use the campsite, you need to make a reservation online from 1 PM on the 1st of every month.
The Moon Observation Deck of Sihwa Narae Tidal Culture Center. The skywalk, which is partially finished with tempered glass, is impressive.
The Moon Observation Deck of the Sihwa Narae Tidal Culture Center is located on Gari Island in the middle of the Sihwa Embankment that connects Daebu Island in Ansan City and Oido Island in Siheung City. This is where the Sihwa Lake tidal power plant is located. On the 25th floor of the Moon Observatory, you can see the West Sea and Sihwa Lake in a 360 ° panorama. The skywalk, which is partially finished with tempered glass, is also impressive. The Moon Observatory is open from 10 am to 10 pm (open year-round).
The Jebudo Island seen from the Silkworm Lighthouse Observatory
Silkworm Island is a landmark of Ansan tourism. It connects to the land through a road that opens twice a day at low tide. When you climb the lighthouse observatory on the silkworm island, Jebudo Island and the West Sea can be seen at a glance. From Tando Port to Nue Island Lighthouse Observatory, it takes about 1km one way, and it takes about 20 minutes to walk slowly. When going to Silkworm Island, be sure to check the tide. Ansan Fishing Village Folk Museum is located in front of Tando Port. Daebu Island is a space that introduces the lives of various islands and island villages in tidal flats. In the large tank in the lobby, there are saltwater fish that live in our ocean, such as fish, sea bass, and sea bass.
Sunset landscape of Gubongdo Sunset Observatory
Gubongdo Sunset Observation Deck is considered as the best sunset point in Ansan. On the observation deck formed above the sea there are also sculptures in the shape of beautiful glow reflected on the waves. From the Jonghyeon Fishing Village Experience Village, follow the coastal path or take the Daebuhaesol Trail leading to the ridge of Gubongdo Island to the Gubongdo Island Observatory. In the high tide, some sections of the coastal roads are submerged, so use the Daebuhaesolgil. 2km one way from Jonghyeon Fishing Village Experience Village to the observation deck. If walking is a burden, you can use an electric car operated by the village.
<Day trip course>
Ansan City World Culture Experience Hall → Explore Ansan Multicultural Village Special Zone → Sihwa Narae Tidal Culture Center's Moon Observation Deck → Gubongdo Island Observation Deck

<2 days and 1 night trip course>
Day 1 / Ansan-si World Culture Experience Center → Explore Ansan Multicultural Village Special Zone → Hwarang Amusement Park → Ansanrang Auto Camping Site
Day 2 / Sihwa Narae Tidal Cultural Center's Moon Observation Deck → Silkworm Island → Ansan Fishing Village Folk Museum → Gubongdo Island Observation Deck

item.title: Exciting basketball game, delicious cooking bout! - Anyang, Gyeonggi-do, Korea
item.description:
A professional basketball arena with a wide audience

Exciting basketball game, delicious cooking bout!

Anyang, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

Korea professional basketball season has begun. In Anyang-si and Goyang-si, Gyeonggi-do, there are indoor gymnasiums where you can watch home games. Enjoy a basketball game with exciting cheering and stop by the nearby restaurants. If the team you support wins, you can celebrate with a warm dish and lose if you lose. Now go to the nearest basketball court!
You don't even have to know the ‘ㄴ’ character of watching the game or playing basketball!
Basketball stadiums are visited by visitors from a variety of floors than other sports. Tickets to the stadium are cheap and the rules of the game are easy to understand. The professional basketball season is held at the end of the year and at the beginning of the year when the winter turns. The 2015-2016 KBL-D (Korean Basketball League-Development, or D-League) kicked off with the first match at the Goyang Indoor Gymnasium. Anyang KGC Ginseng Corp. and Goyang Orion Orions are the teams in Gyeonggi-do. The indoor gymnasium in each area is used as a home stadium, so you can feel the enthusiastic cheering.
Tickets are divided into seats and seats, and seats vary in price depending on the number of floors and locations. Wherever you sit, the stadium is at a glance, and the large screen is set up so you can see the game. But if you want to be more enthusiastic, I recommend the seats in front of the cheerleader. The eyes of the cheerleaders keep coming into contact with each other, so you can have a great time. When you enter the stadium after ticketing, you will be given cheering tools. Two hours will pass quickly and the alarm clock will ring in your stomach. Now it's time to enjoy the game with people and delicious food.
The D-League Games will be held nationwide until February 16, 2016. home page( www.kbl.or.kr ) Or call (02-2106-3000) to see the schedule.
Enjoy a thrilling basketball game on site
Pretend to have a thumbs up! Restaurants in front of Anyang Indoor Gymnasium
If you cheer and sweat as much as the athlete, the style of eating is perfect. Located in front of the Anyang Indoor Gymnasium, 'Koryo Yaksen Samgyetang' is a yakcho cuisine restaurant based on Sanyacho.You can taste Samgyetang and Haesintang.
Anyang Indoor Gymnasium Night View
The samgyetang with abalone, as well as the seafood boiled with various kinds of seafood seems to be full of energy.
Haesintang of `` Koryeo Yaksen Samgyetang '' in front of Anyang Indoor Gymnasium
The broth used for food is Sanyacho broth containing camphor. The precious Sanyacho of Jecheon, located around Sobaeksan, Woraksan, and Chiaksan, and the camphor ginseng grown around Heungjeong Valley flowing below Pyeongchang Heungjeong Mountain are the main ingredients of the main broth. If you add mussel juice to this basic broth, you can make Samgyetang broth. If you add seasonings seasoned with various ingredients, you can make Haesintang broth.
Haesintang with various seafood such as abalone and wild octopus
Sanyacho and camphor broth containing broth is common, but the secret here is to use salt and soy sauce at all. When you eat hot soup, the soup is drowsy and the salty taste is stronger. Then, you can pour more broth, but the soup in this house is not salty at all. Thanks to the harmony of the golden ratio of wild vegetables and seafood found hundreds of times. It looks like an old restaurant, but it's now in its fifth year. The background is the love of Sanyacho over 20 years.
Samgyetang soup with basic Sanyacho broth and mussel juice
Business hours 11: 30 ~ 22: 00, New Year's day and Chuseok holidays, all year round. Samgyetang costs 13,000 won, and Haesintang costs 35,000 won.
The outer skin mixed with perilla and perilla oil
Another restaurant in front of Anyang Indoor Gymnasium is the Chinese restaurant, Janggang. The owner, who has been running the shop for over 20 years, boasts 50 years of Chinese cuisine. One of the most popular dishes in this house is cold champon. It's hard to imagine how champon can be chilled with oil and broth. The cold broth seems to be floating, but the cold champon is very clean and refreshing. Spicy broth filled with seafood is the secret. The seafood in the cold broth is tangle, and the seafood tastes better than the hot broth.
The owner of 'Janggang' sponsors Anyang Sports Team
It is a Chinese restaurant that does not deliver to show delicious dishes. Since the noodles are picked by hand, cooking takes a long time after ordering. If you make a reservation by phone before visiting the store, you can eat right away.
Cold champon, special menu of 'Janggang'
Business hours 11: 00 ~ 21: 00, 7 days a week. Jjajang noodles 5,000 won, cold jjamppong 6,000 won.
The spicy but refreshing seafood is tangled up.
Goyang Indoor Gymnasium, Hidden Neighborhood Restaurants
It's sports spirit that doesn't dwell on the game, but it's hard not to be upset if the team that cheers hard. Sweet food then is the best comfort. On the way to Goyang Indoor Gymnasium, there is a sweet and spicy 'Ilsan Tangsuyuk'. Three years ago, the owner, who was contemplating the restaurant menu, chose sweet and sour pork as his main item. I didn't know much about Chinese food, but because of the belief that sweet and sour pork would be popular and could be transformed into a new taste. The people first tasted sweet and sour pork. Since then, rumors began to appear on the Internet, and people from all over the country came. There were also chain stores in Goyang, near Madu Station, Bucheon, and Uiwang.
`` Ilsan Tangsuyuk '', a glutinous sweet and sour pork restaurant with crispy texture
Sweet and sour pork in this house is sweet and sour pork fried with glutinous rice flour. Crispy and chewy than fried with flour. The sauce is usually two flavors and spicy. Sweet and aftertaste slightly sour but not too sweet or too sweet. Another secret to sweet and sour taste is to season the meat in advance and not add soy sauce to the sauce. This winter, the fish cake soup appeared as a new menu in the shop, which only stuck to sweet and sour pork. It is a menu prepared for the constant demands of regular customers who enjoy sweet and sour liquor along with sweet and sour pork. It also sells a variety of Chinese liquors. After ordering, sweet and sour pork is fried, so it takes about 15 minutes for food to come out. It sells wraps, but does not wrap leftovers. Sweet and sour pork with sauce loses its original taste over time.
The sweet and sour pork of 'Ilsan Tangsuyuk' has a large amount compared to the price
Business hours 17: 00-24: 00, all year round. Sweet and sour pork 12,000 won.
On the way to Goyang Sports Complex Glutinous rice soup of 'Ilsan Tangsuyuk'
Spicy dishes are good for unraveling regardless of the game. The most popular local gourmet restaurant is Choi Bul Bak Chicken, which has been in operation for over 10 years. It is not long ago that a small pub, which used to serve as a love room for residents, became known as a gourmet restaurant by word of mouth.
'Best Chicken', a local restaurant where you can see many years
The secret to earning the reputation as 'the best fire chicken restaurant in Ilsan' is in sauce. Only the master knows the secret sauce. The use of smoked chicken there is a well known trick. Grill the grilled chicken in the kitchen next to the entrance. Selected smoked chicken is grilled crispy on charcoal, put on fire, and sauced over the grill. The spiciness can be selected to a degree, which is divided into spicy, less spicy, and moderately spicy. It's okay to have an obscure order that says, "Please make it hot enough to eat properly." If you want to check the reputation of this house's Bulgogi, spicy is recommended. A set menu where you can eat egg soup, fish cake soup, udon noodles and other spicy rice balls. Packing and delivery are also available.
Unstoppable spiciness heats the whole body
Business hours from 16:00 to 01:00, 7 days a week (excluding national holidays). Bulgogi Set 23,000 won.
Bulgogi set with an egg bath and rice balls

item.title: Take care of your winter health with a cypress sawdust enzyme! If you raise the body temperature by 1 ℃ double your health! - Uijeongbu-si, Gyeonggi-do, Korea
item.description:
Suraksan Cypress Garden Footbath

Take care of your winter health with a cypress sawdust enzyme! If you raise the body temperature by 1 ℃ double your health!

Uijeongbu-si, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

I found a hot place to release the joints that are firm in cold wind and cool my mind. Suraksan Cypress Garden where you can enjoy Cypress Forest Bath and Sawdust Enzyme Bath. The advantage is that you can enjoy short sleeves without worrying about the cold. Find a cypress enzyme bath that boasts excellent anticancer effects.

The body temperature of modern people is lowered by 1 degree on average compared to half a century ago. Hypothermia is known as the leading cause of modern illness. Body temperature of healthy person is 36.7 ~ 37 ℃. At this temperature our internal organs and cells are actively moving. If the body temperature drops here, the function becomes weaker. The same is true for adults saying "warm up your body."
Suraksan Cypress Garden
Thanks to various air conditioners, the room temperature is comfortable regardless of the season. This allows us to live indoors in short sleeves. Our bodies make less effort to maintain body temperature, so they build up excess energy and gain weight.
Suraksan Gbaekwon Information Desk
Is body temperature more important than weight?

The protein enzyme bath has an excellent effect on raising the body temperature. The body temperature of modern people suffering from chronic diseases with low body temperature is raised to 37 ~ 38 ℃. It is a natural treatment using cypress sawdust without the help of artificial heat such as electricity or gas. After 15 minutes of the enzyme enzyme bath, you will feel warm. As the body's temperature rises, the pores expand and enzymes penetrate into it, activating skin cells. Metabolism becomes active as warm energy spreads throughout the body. This is why it helps to improve the constitution of those who are obese.

The beginning of Suraksan Cybaekwon course is the hot rock bed
I'm not sure if I only hear it. What is the protein enzyme bath? It's roughly the same when you think of Jjimjilbang. The difference is that there is an experience course in order, and the enzymatic sawdust enzyme bath is added. The cypress sawdust enzyme bath is an extract of cypress one.
Relax and add a massage pack to your face
Wear a Jjimjilbang costume without underwear, and then enter a hot bedrock bath. It will warm you up for 20 to 30 minutes on a rock made of germanium, charcoal and gravel. Drinking cypress tea, which is served indefinitely, goes to low temperature bedrock bath. Less comfortable than before, you can put a massage pack on your face. The time is about 15-20 minutes. Next, go to the footbath and take a rest as a forest bath.
Suraksan Cypress Garden Footbath
Once you've done all of this, it's time to experience the enzyme protein bath. When you enter the enzymatic bath, put an enzyme-containing proteinaceous sawdust on your body. Think of the sand baths that are common at summer beaches. Covering the cypress sawdust that self-heats instead of the enzyme instead of sand.
Relaxation in the forest bath after the foot bath

Cypress Sawdust
100% natural fever emitted by enzymes from cypress sawdust
“Put the enzyme in the cymbal sawdust and it is a natural fever. The temperature goes up to 70 ℃. If you have hot spots, don't wait. Enzyme bath time is about 15 minutes, but the crowd is not able to fill all the way out first. Fermented bacteria are subtilis that live on straw and grow in cypress sawdust. During the enzymatic bath, negative phytoncide and unique scent relaxes the body. ”
Entry into cypress sawdust enzyme bath
This is the explanation of the surrender ceremony. He started a baekwonwon to take care of family members suffering from cancer and skin diseases. If your body temperature rises by 1 ° C, your immune system will increase by 50%. Is it because he was under stress in the winter? I couldn't feel it only by listening to words, so I decided to try it. It is open on weekdays and on weekends, but fortunately it was possible on weekdays.
