Moisturizes the dry face in the enzyme bath
Perfect for a one-day winter health trip

The bottom line is that the manuscript has always made my back harder. Perhaps because of the sweat from the bedrock bath, the skin is as smooth as the bath. I am suffering from varicose veins. Three times more money than jjimjilbang was not waste. In particular, the enzyme bath, which is excellent for women, was too hot to touch bare skin. I put a towel on my butt and sawed my toe with a sawdust.

The protein enzyme bath is known as an alternative therapy for chemotherapy, female disease or inflammatory disease. Especially if you have an atopy or allergic disease, the cypress sawdust has a direct effect on your skin. Let the body cool down for a while after the enzyme bath. Then rub your whole body with some cypress sawdust. Massage your neck, back, legs and arms. For this purpose, it is better to find Cygwonwon in pairs of two. After the massage, rinse off with water only.
Popular drink pairing tea of cafe
Less burdensome than spas and hot springs. Although it has a price range than the jjimjilbang, it is okay to leave the family alone on one winter day. item.title: Siheung City walk in search of reservoir and mudflat - Siheung, Gyeonggi-do, Korea
item.description:
A traveler is walking down a bank of a water reservoir

Siheung City walk in search of reservoir and mudflat

Siheung, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

A good walking course to catch the autumn breeze is a destination with water. This is because it calms down the excitement of last summer. Siheung-si, Gyeonggi-do is recommended as a walking tour in autumn. There you will find a variety of attractions such as reservoirs, lotus complexes, lagoons ecological parks and pogu.

Former President Syngman Rhee Enjoys Fishing at Water King Reservoir
The waterside outing course in Siheung City consists of Mulwang Reservoir → Lotus Theme Park → Siheung Tidal Valley Ecological Park → Wolgotpo-gu.
The first place to look for is Water Reservoir. The 3rd Gyeongin Expressway, the Seoul Outer Ring Road, and the West Coast Expressway pass nearby, so it is not difficult to visit. Although Heungbu Reservoir is the official name, Water King Reservoir is still more familiar. When the reservoir was installed, it was named 'Hungbu Reservoir' after each letter because it is on the border between Siheung and Bucheon, but it is more widely known as 'Water King Reservoir' because it is located in Mulwang-dong for local residents or travelers. In the late 1950s, former President Syngman Rhee made frequent visits with his own fishing spot.
Even today, many people like to walk, ride bikes, or go fishing. After sunset, many people try to get the romance of cafes. There is a road that circulates through the reservoir, and there is a long driveway to the north. Cars can cause dirt, so try to go as slowly as possible. You can walk round the banks of the west.
Water Reservoir from the Embankment
Sit down at the cafe and read an essay
For autumn trips, it is more appropriate to carry a collection of poetry or essays on a backpack rather than a snack. Settled in a quiet café and sipping a glass of Americano, a few strands of fallen leaves floated up and down the lawn along the wind from the reservoir. Gently pull out a essays. Reading a passage from the essay “Burning leaves,” written by novelist Lee Hyo-seok, seems to return to the days of emotional schooling.
“Is there something like the smell of burning leaves? It smells like freshly roasted coffee. It smells like ripe hazelnuts. If you hold a rake in your hand and stand tall in the smoke forever, looking at the mountains of litter and scattered leaves and smelling fragrant, you'll feel motivated by a fierce life. The smoke will end up in the body, and at any point, it will smell from the hem and back of the hand. ”
Cafe near reservoir upstream
The fellow hobbyists who ride by bicycle color the landscape of the water king reservoir. They depart from the reservoir, go through the lotus theme park, shake their hands, and press the pedals again.
Cycling fellows met at King of Water Reservoir
There is no need to panic because the market is at midday. For lovers who miss their mother's taste, the adzuki bean soup is also recommended. It is also the happiness of the King of Water Reservoir to eat barley rice first and then check the deepening love by blowing hot noodles of red bean kalguksu.
Red Bean Shrimp with a Bean Noodle Soup
Listen to Choi Yang Sook's song 'Autumn Letter' at the Lotus Flower Theme Park
I put the autumn sky in the calm reservoir in my heart and visit the lotus theme park for a while before going to the gutters. The lotus leaves that bloomed lushly last summer changed their clothes to yellow in the fall, and the black lotus was exposed over the blue sky. Only a few drills show me on the surface and say, 'I haven't spent a hot summer yet.'
A group of elementary school students go through the field of fields that adapt to the changing seasons. Thinking of 'experiential learning with an autumn picnic,' sitting in the shade of square sperm on the roof of rice straws, this time listening to a song. Do you know the younger generations who fall into the smartphone “Autumn Letter” by singer Choi Yang-sook? The traveler also listened to this song on their smartphone and sat down. .
Autumn scenery in lotus theme park
“I will write in the fall.
Please accept whoever you are
Deciduous day
The lonely woman is beautiful. ”
Singers Kim Min-do and Soprano Shin Young-ok also sang this song. The taste is of course different. Nevertheless, travelers ranked Choi Yang-suk's sentimental voice best suited this fall.
Elementary school students who participated in hands-on learning with lotus theme park
Siheung Tidal Flat Ecological Park with 3 Tours
Today's third visit is Siheung Tidal Flat Ecological Park. It is an environmentally friendly travel destination where you can learn about the process of making natural salt, study reeds and other salt plants, and get along with the salty autumn breeze. In particular, people who have the question, 'Jeonna Salt, Jeollanam-do or Yeong-gun, aren't you?' At high tide, seawater flows from the West Sea to the bottom of Sorae Bridge into the inner city of Incheon and Siheung. For this reason, torsion has developed in these areas since ancient times, and traces remain. Siheung City Ecological Park is established in Siheung City, and Sorae Wetland Ecological Park is established in Incheon City.
Siheung Tidal Ecological Park Info Center
Siheung Valley Ecological Park Info Center is the starting point. Inside, there are a number of panels that tell you about the lagoons, the torsion, and the vegetation. The tour departs from the info center and returns to the hills opposite the hour, divided into one hour (2.2 km), two hours (4.5 km) and three hours (9.4 km). All three courses are designed to intersect through the Rock Observation Deck in the middle. However, regardless of the course, you can go freely as you like. Most of the way out like a labyrinth is flat, so it is not uncomfortable to walk.
Rocking Observatory to see the whole park
Even now, salt salt is produced here in Yantai.
When you enter the promenade, you lie down every time the wind blows and then stand up again to hear the legend of autumn in the reeds. The reeds here are young, and the colors are softer than those in places like Ansan Reed Marsh Park. Among the poems written by the poet Nervim about reeds are these verses: "He didn't know that living was crying silently in this way." I did. Living day by day is a sublime act that endures with a firm root even if it is hard to fall down and strong winds blow. Wouldn't it have been a meaningless day if you didn't have a reed field outing on the lagoons?
Reeds telling the fall of deep
When the tide comes in, the seawater that enters the park along the ravine is reborn as a salt of natural salt. Around three or four o'clock in the afternoon, the salt can be harvested and taken to the warehouse.
Salted salt pushing a wheelbarrow
The salt waters are reflected in the salt water, pushing the cart full of salt. At any time, the scene is as inspiring as 'Malljong', a famous painting of Millet.
The sun-dried salt in the cart
Against the backdrop of the Southeast Bridge, a few fishing boats and seagulls, the last warmth is buried in the sea of muzzle.
Wolgotpo-gu
Subsequently, Wolgotpogu's sashimi restaurants brightly light up. The smell of lobster, clams grilling, and the smell of boiling kalguksu and crab soup attract people.
Blue crab soup in Wolgotpogu
As the poet Lee Moon-jae puts it, he pushes the door of a quiet restaurant where there are no customers yet to forgive himself for the sin of walking out of the street.
Grilled lobster of Wolgotpogu

item.title: Siheung Lotus Theme Park (Gwangokji) and Incheon Sorae Wetland Ecological Park - Siheung, Gyeonggi-do, Korea
item.description:
Gwanokji

Siheung Lotus Theme Park (Gwangokji) and Incheon Sorae Wetland Ecological Park

Siheung, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

When the sun rises and the sun is full, the petals are opened. When the sun tilts, the petals fold. The flowers of the sun blooming and blooming along the sun are now in full bloom at Gwanokji Temple and Lotus Theme Park. Sorae Wetland Ecological Park is a spectacular view of the red tidal vegetation with sunlight. The vast marsh trail through which the wind passes is romantic in itself.

Kang Hee-min, a Korean who bloomed lotuses

In the 9th year of Joseon Dynasty (1463), Kang Hee-myung, a deputy director of the Korean Central Court, brings lotus seeds from Nanjing Hall. Arriving in Joseon, Kang Hee-min planted seeds in a pond in Siheung, Gyeonggi-do. And the kite blossoms.
Kang Hee-min was in office in Sejong 29 (1447), paying at the door and star hour. Among those who passed along with him at the time was Seongsammun (emergency paid to literature). He was well known as a prominent connoisseur, including participating in compilations such as GyeongGuk Daejeon, Dongmunseon, Dongguk Yeoji Seungram, and the rites of National Jockey, but he was also an agronomist who wrote a farm book such as Geumyang Miscellaneous. Therefore, lotus blossomed with interest and affection for farming.
Gwanok-ji was so known as a lotus pond, but in fact, there was a lotus in Joseon before that. The Annals of the Joseon Dynasty The Taejong Annals show that in 1411, Taejong served the king and drank alcohol at the Gwangyeonru in Changdeokgung Palace.

A lotus blooms in a small pond of Gwanokji, giving off its fragrant aroma. The lotus of Gwanokji is white with the tip of pale pink. Along with the beautiful shape of the lotus flower, you will also feel the heart of a man who planted seeds more than 500 years ago. Gwanokji is the 8th ruins of Siheung-si, Gyeonggi-do.

Lotus flower blooming in the canyon
Water lily

The lotus theme park is next to the fence of Gwanokji Temple. If you go to the 3.2ha lotus theme park, you can see dozens of different kinds of lotuses, including lotuses and water lilies. Walk along the path between the broad leaves and large white flowers that are commonly seen. The fragrance of the soft and soft lotus blooms.

Lotus Theme Park
Doombung, which has been confined in water, lives with crucian carp, frog, loach, and thunder. Passing Doombang further into the crowd, there are quite a lot of people. This is where tropical water lilies bloom. Tropical water lilies have small leaves and small flowers, but their colors and shapes are intense. Enough to captivate people.
There is a thatched roof shelter in the lotus field.
Tropical water lilies such as Ostara, Marian Stron, Star Ofsham, Pink Neofades, Miami Rose, Sunshine, and Albert Greenberg are gathered in one place. Similar but different types of cameras point at each other.
Doombung
In the pond where the plants grow next to the tropical water lilies, more people gather to watch something and sometimes see it. People don't know how to see the blue plants. There is a horsefowl. The horseshoe chicken is a bird of the squirrel. Body black but belly gray, beak red, and beak yellow. A summer migratory bird that breeds in reservoirs, stream tributaries, and lush wetlands.
연
People watch as young horses and chickens, which are just born, walk or swim along their mothers. People speak in two words in a scene where a mother with a head in the water catches a prey and puts it in the mouth of the babies who are running. "Look at that. There, there!" The words are touched with admiration. The horsewater chicken family roams all over the pond and takes the visitor's popularity. I don't know how to go there.
Tropical water lily
The sun's light tilts like an awl. The lotus flower opens when the sun rises and the sun's energy spreads, opening the petals when the sun tilts. So it is called the flower of the sun. The wide open petals send the scent far and wide. Looking back at the setting sun, the trails follow the trails between the fields, and the scent of the lotus flowers has not disappeared.
Horseshoe family
To get to Siheung Lotus Theme Park, take City Bus No. 63 in front of Sosa Station Exit 1 on Subway Line 1 and get off at Seongwon and Dong-A Apartments. From there it is about 900m to the lotus theme park.
The sunset lotus theme park
Noodles, the red tidal flats

If you have visited Gwanokji Temple and Lotus Theme Park, you should see Incheon Sorae Wetland Ecological Park, about 8 ~ 9km away. You will feel the vitality and romance of the tidal flats while walking along the windy wetlands. Sorae Wetland Ecological Park is about 1.5 km from Sunaepo Soraepo Station.

Sorae Tidal Flat
Sorae Wetland Ecological Park was originally a Sorae Salt Farm. Sorae Salt Farm was produced in the mid 1930s and began producing salt. This salt was transported to Soonpo-gu by Incheon Expressway by narrow-line train or ship. These salts were then used as munitions for gunpowder. Sorae Salt Farm was closed in 1996 and was reborn as Sorae Wetland Ecological Park in 2009.
Great place to take pictures
On the way to the ecological park you can see tidal flats and tidal flats. Various plants and animals live there. Tidal-flats are alive.
Skeleton
The reason why the tidal flats are all red is because of salt plants such as seven noodles. Among the salt plants growing in the salty ground, reddish color is the seventh and the red seaweed, and Sorae mud flats are particularly rich. Salt plants are the primary producers of coastal wetlands that feed animals and cleanse contaminants.
Salt viewing from the Observation Deck of Sorae Wetland Ecological Park
On the tidal flats, live crabs, mudfish, thunders, and mudworms are also living well. There are also seagulls, ducks, snipes, and spoonbills that feed on them. At Sorae Wetland Ecological Park Exhibition, learn about Sorae's salt and tidal flats.
Salt warehouse
Plants growing in wetland parks are blowing in the wind. As you move along the trail, the windmill stands somewhere. The windy wetland park is quite romantic. Walk through the scenery of a wetland park with windmills.
The mudflat is all red turkey
You can also experience the tidal flats by entering the tidal flats where salt plants and living things live. The faces of the children experiencing the tidal flats are alive.

item.title: Paju, Gyeonggi-do, Korea - In Camp Greaves, I'm a descendant of the sun!
item.description:
Camp Greaves Youth Hostel

In Camp Greaves, I'm a descendant of the sun!

Paju, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

`` The Descendants of the Sun, '' a drama that heats up 2016. At the same time, Songsong Couple has taken away people's hearts, and the filming location is also a hot topic. One of them is Camp Greaves, which is located in the DMZ like a military drama. As it is pre-production drama, set is demolished and remains, but how about still? If you see a little familiar spot like Deja vu along Song Joong-gi's hand, you can do it anywhere!
Camp Greaves, troops that saved Ryan
If you are a fan of war movies or dramas, there is a place that will open your eyes and interest you. The 506th Regiment was the main character of the American drama Band of Brothers, and the hero of Ryan, the hero of the movie "Saving Private Ryan," which featured World War II. They are Camp Greaves stationed in Korea.
The familiar Urk base, which occupies most of the 'sun descendants' background, is one of the oldest US military bases where the 2nd Division 506th Infantry Battalion, which remained after the Korean War Armistice Agreement, returned to it in August 2007. At present, the appearance of the military forces is so high that it might be a job for Captain Yu Si-jin.
Entrance to Camp Greaves
Camp Greaves is just 2 km from the southern limit of the demilitarized zone (DMZ), a demilitarized zone designed to prevent clashes between the two Koreas. The military withdrew in 2004, but the trace remains intact and tells the story. On the land of more than 200,000 square meters, various facilities such as the repair shop where Song Joong-gi performed great action through the fighting scene with the US military in the `` Descendants of the Sun '', officers' accommodations, dormitories and gymnasiums are preserved as they are. It is worth it.
Unit mark with salute relief.
Despite sufficient cultural value, Camp Greaves, which was in danger of being demolished, was transformed into a peace and security experience facility for civilians after the efforts of Paju, Gyeonggi-do. In addition to various experiences such as security tourism and DMZ ecological experience, the first youth hostel that can spend the night in the civilian access control line (civil communication line) came to us.
Gymnasiums used for various events such as film festivals
Army? Youth hostel?
To visit Camp Greaves, you must first apply to the military. The excitement in front of the open Unification Bridge is thrilled with the countless varieties of barricades and the captured soldiers who thoroughly check their IDs. The bare-hearted mind falls down in front of the entrance to the Camp Greaves barbed wire, which is like a military unit with the words 'No entry'.
Confusingly similar to military units
The youth hostel, remodeled from a quarter of US military officers' quarters, is designed to accommodate up to 240 people. There are offices and small auditoriums on the first floor, quarters on the second and third floors, and auditoriums and restaurants for indoor activities on the fourth floor. If you encounter three kinds of set, you will be enlightened by the fact that you can see the military quarters, lodging that is reminiscent of the army quarters, meals that are used by the military, and Nara Love Concert, a music concert enjoyed by security officers of the 1st Division.
Meal too!
It does not have training facilities such as physical training, but welcomes those who seek unique security experiences using the uniqueness of the civilian line. DMZ 1129 is a mandatory field trip program for the day, two nights, two nights, and three nights.It explores nearby attractions such as the 3rd Tunnel, Dora Observatory, Dorasan Station, and Dorasan Peace Park to solve special tasks in the workbook That's the way. The program, which means 1129 days of long war, is popular because it can naturally learn about the DMZ and the reality of the current division between North and South.
Daesung High School students visiting the DMZ exhibition hall
In addition, in order to satisfy the tastes of various participants from elementary school students to high school students, various programs such as security OX games, unification, mini-jangseung, or soot-making, express warrior selection, camp play yard, and challenging DMZ Golden Bell are prepared.
Daesung High School students are taking group photos
At the end of the event, the Peace Prayer Ribbon, which was written by a young student, was written in a single letter.
Students in the Strategic Domino Program
In addition to the experience program, Camp Greaves will also meet with outsiders in various ways, including using the gym as an event venue for the opening ceremony of the DMZ International Documentary Film Festival. It is more precious and meaningful only because you can experience the only site DMZ that contains the pain of division. Isn't the time to raise the desire for unification through Camp Greaves be the key to our unification?
The wishes of the participants who pushed on 'unification of the two Koreas' are conveyed in their hearts.

item.title: Paju, Gyeonggi-do, Korea - The shooting location is also awesome! The place where the sad love of first love was loaded, the drama 'She was pretty'
item.description:
Gangmun beach bench where Seongjun and Hyejin sat together

The shooting location is also awesome! The place where the sad love of first love was loaded, the drama 'She was pretty'

Paju, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

This fall, a remarkable romantic drama <She was pretty>, who threw away the hearts of women, farewell to viewers. Hyejin, who has been transformed into a “bomb bomber,” and Seong-joon's sweet romance, which is transformed into a “super-climb lottery man,” has also melted their hearts. Let's go find the romance that might meet your first love.
Where her hand touched him, the Forest of Wisdom
Hyejin (Hwang Jung-eum) and Sung Joon (Park Seo-jun), the heroes of the male and female characters in the drama, do not seem to pass. However, there is a space that suggests their ties through a book found together with time difference.
Entrance to the Forest of Wisdom
Introduced as an in-house library during the play, it often appeared as a meeting place for Sung Jun, boosting viewers' interest. It is the Forest of Wisdom located in Paju Publishing City.
State of visitor reading freely
As soon as you open the door of a low and distinctive building, you seem to have entered a large bookshelf forest. It's about 8m high, and it's about a whirlwind. However, if you walk along the scent of paper that warms your heart, you might find a more attractive library.
A space designed to keep visitors comfortable throughout the day
It is different from other libraries boasting heavy silence. Freedom flows for a mother to read a storybook by her child. If you're going to take a bite, you can also enjoy some light food at the cafe. For those who want to eat a meal properly, one of the three pavilions that make up the Forest of Wisdom has a restaurant called Glow. During the week, we offer a selection of attractive lunch sets at good prices.
Lunch set of restaurant "Glow" which satisfies both taste and price
If you want to spend a lazy one night and two nights with a book, you can use the guest house support. There are three buildings open 24 hours a day, so it's perfect to spend a long night in the sea.
Guest House Jijihyang Lounge
Where he recognized her, Gangmun Beach

Loosen the lone boat anchor and climb on the sperm. I will.

-From Song Kang Jeong-cheol, Kanto Star Song

Gangmun Beach with beautiful structures to take pictures
Song Kang Chungcheol expressed how beautiful he was in the Kwandong Byeonggok with the expression 'Everything's around the Gangneung' Gangmungyo '(currently the bridge) in the 16th century. The indigo sea behind the signboard with this phrase is where Sung Joon began to feel sweet emotions for Hyejin for the first time. Gangmun Beach, located south of Gangmun Bridge, is the beach that filled the hearts of many people like her smiling in the camera frame taken for the magazine photo shoot.
Gangmun beach with beautiful indigo
Located next to Gyeongpo Beach, this place is small and quiet unlike Gyeongpo Beach, so it is the best place to think alone. This place is perfect for `` traveling alone. '' The beautiful structures I saw in the drama are also sparse, so it's good to take a picture with your lover or a friend and leave memories. If you are planning to stay overnight, check out the night Gangmun Beach. The night view of the sodary bridge connecting Gangmun beach and Gyeongpo beach is excellent.
The light changes every moment and the night view of the more beautiful tower
For those who just want to meet Gangmun beach, I recommend a meal at Paul & Mary, a homemade burger house located at the beginning. Beach and homemade burgers. It's a strange combination that can't be imagined, but it's rumored to be already in line.
State of exotic shop
The main menu is the bacon mozzarella burger, where the mozzarella cheese flows like a waterfall. Don't be surprised to see how the modifier, 'visual thug' fits together. Juicy patties, chewy and rich mozzarella cheese, and fresh vegetables combine to create a more fantastic combination.
Typical bacon mozzarella burger
The place where he and her tremble are kept
It was fascinated by the warm lunches prepared for loved ones who work on the weekends and the high-profile of the proposals. It's Dumulhead, a place that viewers choose as the best scene, and the best choice for photo hobbyists.
Dumulmul, formerly called 'head', refers to the area of Yangshu-ri, Yangseo-myeon where the stems of the Namhan River and the Bukhan River meet and merge. Until 1973, Paldang Dam was a people staying in Gangwon-do on the waterway. However, instead of a lane, the boat was blocked, and so did his life as a muzzle.
Fantastic look of Dumulde head
But many still visit here. To see the fantastic scenery you can't find anywhere else. The blue light that meets the sky, Kim Hue-sung, the only shipyard in Korea, and the 400-year-old zelkova tree, which boasts a height of 30m and a circumference of 8m, combine to create a unique and rare landscape. Thanks to this, it is popular not only for drama but also for various shooting places such as movies, advertisements and weddings.
The best place to take pictures on Dumuldeu
At dawn, photographers from all over the country gather to capture the fascinating sunrise of Dumul head. It is hard to express how the water mist that blooms lump together creates a dreamy atmosphere. The inscription on the rock tells us, 'Did you see the water fog that mysteriously rises in the dawn sky?' If you're curious about the wonderful dawn of the water fog, why don't you go on an early date this weekend?
Painter sketching head

item.title: Yangju, Gyeonggi-do, Korea - Enhance Art Sense by Following with Kwon Yul, Yangju Art Museum
item.description:
Love by Kang Young-min installed at the beginning of Jangheung Art Park

Enhance Art Sense by Following with Kwon Yul, Yangju Art Museum

Yangju, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

During the boom of mica, Yangju Ilyoung Amusement Park, Jangheung Amusement Park, and Songchu Amusement Park were named to the 4050 households as the Capital Region Drive Course. There are restaurants around the valley with football courts, so it was a good place for family outings. Now all are fading, but as much as Jangheung Amusement Park enters the famous art galleries, which makes the weekend drive fun.
Outing course in conjunction with art museums, cultural monuments and observatory
Route 39, which connects Deoyang-gu, Goyang-si, and Suseong-dong, Uijeongbu-si, is called Pyeong-ro-ro. This road leads to Jangheung police box and meets a fork called Kwon Yul-ro. Kwon Yul-ro, named after General Kwon-yul, ends at the intersection of Jangheung Art Park, Jangheung Sculpture Park, Yangju City Jang Ukjin Art Museum (hereinafter referred to as Jang Ukjin Art Museum), Horsehead Pass, Ahn Sang-cheol Art Museum and Kisan Reservoir, and at the intersection of Yangju Culture and Arts Center.
In front of Jang Ukjin Museum
Kwon Yul General is located just past the entrance of Jang Ukjin Museum of Art. General Kwon Yul is one of the masters who saved the country during the Imjin War. The dish towel that led to victory is considered to be the Three Great Battalion, along with the Pearl Battling and the Hansan Island Battling. While passing through Kwon Yul-ro, his head is bowed to the general spirit and national ideology of the general. As such, the trip to the Yangju Museum of Art is a trip with cultural heritage. If you include the Songam Space Center, it is a good study outing course that combines astronomical studies. Awaken the sense of art through art museum visits, creating a sense of empathy between parents and children, and enriching stories. So going out to three art galleries in Kwon Yul-ro is not a simple drive.
Dome Theater at Songam Space Center
Jangheung Art Park
Departing from Gupabal, Gisan Reservoir is the final destination and Jangheung Art Park is the first art space to meet at Kwon Yul-ro. It has been bent since it was renamed several times since its establishment. Total Art Museum was first established in 1984, but in 2005, it changed to Jangheung Art Park due to management problems. Later in 2006, Japanese designer and architect Shigeru Uchida designed Art Park and structural designer Van Shigeru designed the venue. In May of that year, an exhibition hall, atelier, performance hall, art gallery, sculpture park, and children's experience center were completed.
Bourdel's Sculpture <Fruit>
Jangheung Art Park is not an art museum dedicated to painting with a certain distance. It is a playground-friendly art space that touches works and displays works that children can ride on. The name of this garden is Bourdel Garden. Sculptures by the sculptor Bourdel, such as Fruits, a Crouching Sacred Woman and Roman Mother and Child, expressing the love of mother and child, welcome visitors from all over the lawn. French sculptor Bourdel is one of the three greatest masters of modern sculpture, along with Rodin and Mayol.
Bourdel's Sculpture <Our Lady with Offerings>
Picasso Children's Art Museum
The Picasso Children's Art Museum is a must-see for adults. Although it is a replica, you can see the works and passionate lives of Picasso's soul (1881 ~ 1973) here. In particular, Picasso's photographs taken by photographer Andre Viller (1930 ~) are incredible, so they are more inspiring. The two first met in 1953. Since then, Biller has photographed many scenes, including Picasso's focus on his work and his thoughts. Picasso's passion in black and white photography and his desire for artistic life come alive.
Mark Quinn's Sculpture <Myth>
Picasso's 11 portraits and family photos also catch the eye. In addition, you can appreciate Picasso's pottery, prints, drawings, and silver plates. Looking back before leaving the museum, Dad takes off his hat and climbs up a ladder in shorts to depict the naked woman's body in a straight line. The viewer's chest is refreshing.
Picasso working in the studio
In addition, Ryu In's Express Train-The Era of Times, Kim Taek Ki's Dream of Peace, Mark Quinn's Myth, and Kang Young Min's Love are the representative sculptures of Jangheung Art Park.
Sculpture by Artist Ryu In <Express Train-The Era of Times>
Jang Ukjin Museum of Art
Just a little up from Jangheung Art Park towards Kwon Yul General Cemetery, Yangju Museum of Art is displayed. The museum was designed after Jang Uk-jin's tiger painting and was opened in April 2014 and won the Kim Soo-geun Architecture Award that year. It is a great pride to have a large collection of genuine artists. More than 230 pieces of murals, oil paintings, prints, ink paintings, etc. are donated by the Jang Uk-Jin Art and Culture Foundation to display them by theme and period.
Yangju Museum of Art
Painter Jang Uk-jin (1917 ~ 1990) is a master of Western painting that represents Korean modern art along with Park Soo-geun and Lee Joong-seop. Born in Yeong-gun, Chungcheongnam-do (now Sejong Special Self-Governing City), the story of his art museum entering Yangju was due to his studio in Deokso, once a land of Yangju County. Since then, he has continued his creative activities in the studios of Seoul Myeongryon-dong, Chungju Suanbo and Yongin Singal.
Visitors to <Animal Family> at Jang Ukjin Museum of Art
<Animal Family> and <Dining Table> painted on cement wall
Admission is good to start from the second floor. In this way, you can meet the master's work first and reflect on his life once again in the first floor video room. <Animal Family> on the second floor is a work that is loved by visitors. Created in 1964, the work description attached to the side tells the old story with black and white photography. Animal Family was painted on the wall of the studio in Deokso, Gyeonggi-do. The warm gaze of the painter can be felt in the artwork where cows, chickens, pigs and dogs are harmoniously drawn like a family. In particular, the real cowcoats and warangs are hung on the murals to evoke local sentiments.
Jang Ukjin Museum of Art
The work that peeled off the painted wall is in the middle of the stairs connecting the basement and the first floor. The title is <Table>. Let's look at the description of the work. “The paintings show the modern life of an artist, and on the screen are forks and knives, spoons and rice bowls, coffee cups, water glasses, flounder and bones. After the painter completed this picture, 'he became. Today, let's replace one meal with this meal. '
Mother and daughter resting in front of the cafe on the 1st floor of Jang Ukjin Museum of Art
The idea of using the gray cement wall as a canvas, and the simplicity and warmth of the canvas. Visitors find love for people and objects in each of their works, develop their imagination, and find themselves more generous. The beauty of a trip to a museum is this.
Jangheung Sculpture Park in front of Jang Ukjin Museum of Art
Ahn Sang-cheol Museum of Art Brings Kisan Reservoir to the Garden
The trip to the museum following Kwon Yul-ro of Yangju-si ends at the An Sang-cheol Museum of Art, located next to Gisan Reservoir. Ahn Sang-cheol (1927-1993) is a painter who left many famous works in the field of oriental painting. He was a professor at Seorabol Art College and Sungshin Women's University. Ahn Sang-cheol, who became a national war star after winning the Minister of Education, Vice President's Award, and President's Award in 1959, married Na Hee-kyun, a contemporary student of Seoul National University and nephew of Na Hye-seok.
Kisan Reservoir from Ansangcheol Museum of Art
At the entrance of the museum, you can follow Ahn's life and enter the exhibition space to see his works. It is a series of work titled <(靈)>, which has colored the old tree. He created this work with the thought that 'the spirit is a body that remains and is passed on by someone even when it dies.'
Ahnsangcheol Museum of Art from the Lawn
The line of spectators continues in front of her works. Although he is an old man with 12 solo exhibitions, he is still actively engaged in creative activities. The copper line is a lawn, which leads to the Kisan Reservoir. The building of the museum is the work of Ahn Woo-sung, the son of Ahn Sang-cheol and the owner of Ongodang Architects. There is a studio with a glass window behind one flower garden. This is where Na Hee-kyun, a painter, sometimes stops to paint. The Ahn Sang-cheol Museum of Art will open until July 15.
Artist Lee Hee-kyun's work <My Mirina 2>

item.title: Trip to Pangyo Time Machine from Three Kingdoms Dolbang Grave to Digital Aquarium
item.description:
Small Pangyo Museum exterior with 1st floor

Trip to Pangyo Time Machine from Three Kingdoms Dolbang Grave to Digital Aquarium

Seongnam, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

Just a few years ago, Pangyo was just a restricted area of outskirts of Seongnam or Gyeongbu Expressway. The development of a new city led to the construction of a large-scale apartment complex and many IT companies nesting in Pangyo Techno Valley have now become the most modern city. Examination of the excavations reveals that Paleyo had already lived during the Paleolithic period. In the Hanseong Baekje era, belonging to Baekje, Jangsu King descended to Koguryeo in the late 5th century and Silla since the mid 6th century. It has been part of Gwangju since the Goryeo Dynasty, and only 40 years ago. Starting from the Three Kingdoms Ancient Burial Mound, a digital aquarium that looks like a scene of the future and a shopping mall Avenue Franc are leaving for a day trip to Pangyo where you can travel in various time zones as if you were riding a time machine.

Pangyo Museum with Baekje and Goguryeo Stone Chamber

Pangyo Museum is a place where exhibits of relics and ruins discovered during the construction of Pangyo New Town show the long history of Pangyo. In the process of cultural property research conducted prior to the development of the housing site, nine ancient tombs of Hanseong Baekje era, two ancient Goguryeo tombs in Sampyeong-dong, the Goryeo period and Cheongja, and the white porcelain period were discovered. A museum was built in the area where Baekje burial mounds were mainly excavated and opened in the winter of 2013.

It's a single-story building from the outside, but when you enter, it's one floor above the ground, but you'll be surprised because it's several times deeper. As a museum that mainly displays burial mounds, the entire building is concentrated under the ground.
Underground burial mound exhibition room of Pangyo Museum from the first floor
The first floor shows excavated artifacts by period. There are many kinds of earthenware and pottery such as flat pattern earthenware, comb earthenware, celadon and white porcelain, and there are also ornaments such as bronze mirrors, rings and silver bracelets.
Various earthenware and pottery are on display
Before going down to the basement, look down the entire basement room from the railing. Everything that looks like a small room is tombs, and there is a pedestrian passageway between them that makes you feel as if you are walking back into the Three Kingdoms period for more than 1500 years.
Excavation artifacts ranging from flat pattern earthenware to white porcelain
Of the nine Baekje burial mounds, two were asleep in the ground without excavating outside the museum. Goguryeo burial mounds were so large that they were numbered and rebuilt.
Back into the tomb of Baekje for over 1,500 years
Baekje and Goguryeo burial mounds are both stone stones tombs. Most of them are believed to have been made in the late 4th century to the late 5th century. Baekje burial mounds were piled up firmly in small stones, and Koguryo burial mounds mainly used large stones.
An narrator explaining to the children the tomb
Ornaments, earthenware, clay pots and plates were unearthed in Baekje tombs, while no artifacts were found in Koguryo tombs. There are various types of burial mounds that may have been buried, two twin rooms with two stone chambers, and mounds with many traces of lime on the floor and walls.
Bronze Bodhisattva statue excavated during the Koryo Dynasty
There are separate experience spaces between burial mounds. Activities include matching a ceramic puzzle, stamping a relic with a major relic, taking a peek into the camera to see the inside of the tomb, discovering relics with a touch screen, and taking quizzes. If you are accompanied by an elementary school student, take advantage of the activity sheet given at the entrance.
Space for various hands-on activities
Pangyo Museum does not have many exhibits compared to the large museum, but you can see the stonebang tomb of the Three Kingdoms era right in front of you. In addition, the difference between Baekje and Goguryeo tombs can be identified immediately.
Visitors experiencing the excavation experience with the touch screen
Aquarium without a fish
Icuarium is a state-of-the-art digital aquarium with no living fish. Visitors can use a smart kit, Aqua Kit, to observe marine life, view descriptions of fish, and play games given at each location.
IQArium Ticket Office and Entrance
The sea embodied delicately on the big screen is nothing but water, just like the vivid sea. In addition, the smart aquarium that responds every time you touch, the power of digital is amazing.
Inside the aquarium decorated like a marine probe
When you enter the IQ Aquarium, you will receive an Aqua Kit, an exploration device, and enter your name or nickname. The interior is decorated by traveling by sea on a marine probe and meeting various marine life. The exploration is complete by navigating the tunnel of evolution, the rich sea, the vast sea, the calm sea, the unknown sea and watching 4D video at the end of the tour.
Aqua kit for viewing
Each place is given a mission as if playing a game. For example, when extinct ancient marine fossils now appear on the Aqua Kit, you can click on the Aqua Kit hard to flesh it out to restore its original form, or touch the Aqua Kit to break the ice to save the marine life trapped in the ice. to be. It is more interesting because it is played by children's favorite game method, and not only children but also adults are immersed. You can't touch the fish directly, but if you touch and play with the Aqua Kit and touch screen, you can spend an hour.
Game of catching fish in digital fishbowl
If you have learned the past at the Pangyo Museum and have traveled the future at IQArium, it is your turn to enjoy the taste and style of the present at Avenue Franc.
Shopping mall Avenue France
Avenue Franco, a European street shopping mall, is the most trendy space in Pangyo these days. There are restaurants, cafés, shops, and beauty salons just over 200 meters away. It's fun to see the beautifully decorated streets and shops.
Trendy shops and restaurants along pretty alleys
The taste, kindness and atmosphere are good, but the price of food and goods is generally high, so it is hard to open your wallet.
The finish is a sweet dessert
